Completely absorbed in her magic, she failed to notice the small splinter of broken earth creeping up the side of her earthen platform.\r\n\r\nRight as she was about to reach the climax of her epic Ursa Major VS Dragon light show in the sky above, a massive shift jarred her out of concentration.  Before she could even register what was happening, the entire cliff face gave way,  cascading freely toward the valley far below.  Flashes of her past flickered through her mind, as the ground rushed toward her..\r\n\r\n***\r\n\r\nShe woke up, tangled in sheets on the floor next to the bed.\r\n\r\n\xe2\x80\x9cUgghh... A small tinge of pity for the hoard below was quickly snuffed out by the realization that no creature could possibly match her excellence, it wasn\xe2\x80\x99t their fault that she was just...superior.  Flawless genetics and years of tireless practice had honed the ultimate conduit of pure unicorn power.\r\n\r\n\xe2\x80\x9cBEHOLD!\xe2\x80\x9d she shouted, causing everypony below to look up in awe,  \xe2\x80\x9cThe Great and Powerful TRIXIE in all of her electrifying majesty has ARRIVED!\xe2\x80\x9d\r\n\r\nAn eruption of dazzling fireworks and lightning bolts lit up the night sky, followed by the thunderous sound of thousands of stamping hooves and cheering equines. Ursa Major VS Dragon light show in the sky above, a massive shift jarred her out of concentration.&nbsp;&nbsp;Before she could even register what was happening, the entire cliff face gave way,&nbsp;&nbsp;cascading freely toward the valley far below.&nbsp;&nbsp;Flashes of her past flickered through her mind, as the ground rushed toward her..</p><p class="double">***</p><p class="double">She woke up, tangled in sheets on the floor next to the bed.</p><p class="double">\xe2\x80\x9cUgghh... Dammit Trixie!\xe2\x80\x9d, the purple mare glared down at her blue counterpart on the floor \xe2\x80\x9cThis is the third time this week! Completely absorbed in her magic, she failed to notice the small splinter of broken earth creeping up the side of her earthen platform.\r\n\r\nRight as she was about to reach the climax of her epic Ursa Major VS Dragon light show in the sky above, a massive shift jarred her out of concentration.  Before she could even register what was happening, the entire cliff face gave way,  cascading freely toward the valley far below.  Flashes of her past flickered through her mind, as the ground rushed toward her..\r\n\r\n***\r\n\r\nShe woke up, tangled in sheets on the floor next to the bed.\r\n\r\n\xe2\x80\x9cUgghh... Dammit Trixie!\xe2\x80\x9d, the purple mare glared down at her blue counterpart on the floor \xe2\x80\x9cThis is the third time this week! no creature could possibly match her excellence, it wasn\xe2\x80\x99t their fault that she was just...superior.&nbsp;&nbsp;Flawless genetics and years of tireless practice had honed the ultimate conduit of pure unicorn power.</p><p class="double">\xe2\x80\x9cBEHOLD!\xe2\x80\x9d she shouted, causing everypony below to look up in awe,&nbsp;&nbsp;\xe2\x80\x9cThe Great and Powerful TRIXIE in all A small tinge of pity for the hoard below was quickly snuffed out by the realization that no creature could possibly match her excellence, it wasn\xe2\x80\x99t their fault that she was just...superior.  Flawless genetics and years of tireless practice had honed the ultimate conduit of pure unicorn power.\r\n\r\n\xe2\x80\x9cBEHOLD!\xe2\x80\x9d she shouted, causing everypony below to look up in awe,  \xe2\x80\x9cThe Great and Powerful TRIXIE in all of her electrifying majesty has ARRIVED!\xe2\x80\x9d\r\n\r\nAn eruption of dazzling fireworks and lightning bolts lit up the night sky, followed by the thunderous sound of thousands of stamping hooves and cheering equines.  Trixie illuminated the entire cliff face with a soft purple glow. Completely absorbed in her magic, she failed to notice the small splinter of broken earth creeping up the side of her earthen platform.\r\n\r\nRight as she was about to reach the climax of her epic Ursa Major VS Dragon light show in the sky above, a massive shift jarred her out of concentration.  Before she could even register what was happening, the entire cliff face gave way,  cascading freely toward the valley far below.  Flashes of her past flickered through her mind, as the ground rushed toward her..\r\n\r\n***\r\n\r\nShe woke up, tangled in sheets on the floor next to the bed.\r\n\r\n\xe2\x80\x9cUgghh... Trixie stood proudly upon a cliff high above a mass of mindless pony followers, her perfectly trimmed tail and billowing cape flowing in the wind.&nbsp;&nbsp;A small tinge of pity for the hoard below was quickly snuffed out by the realization that no creature could possibly match her excellence, it wasn\xe2\x80\x99t their fault that she was just...superior.&nbsp;&nbsp;Flawless genetics and years of tireless practice had honed the ultimate conduit of pure unicorn power.</p><p class="double">\xe2\x80\x9cBEHOLD!\xe2\x80\x9d she shouted, causing everypony below to look up in the night sky, followed by the thunderous sound of thousands of stamping hooves and cheering equines.&nbsp;&nbsp;Trixie illuminated the entire cliff face with a soft purple glow.&nbsp;&nbsp;The magical light accented her impeccable coat.</p><p class="double">\xe2\x80\x9cSimpletons of Equestria!\xe2\x80\x9d She exclaimed, with her most powerful vocal enhancement spell, \xe2\x80\x9cThe Great and Powerful Trixie is about to ROCK YOUR WORLD!\xe2\x80\x9d\xc2\xa0</p><p class="double">Unknown to Trixie,&nbsp;&nbsp;the ground below her was weakening from the constant vibrations of the excited crowd below.&nbsp;&nbsp;Completely absorbed in her magic, she failed to notice the small splinter of broken earth creeping up the side of her earthen platform.</p><p class="double">Right as she was about to reach the climax of her epic Ursa Major VS Dragon light show in the sky above, a massive shift jarred her out of concentration.&nbsp;&nbsp;Before she could even register what was happening, A small tinge of pity for the hoard below was quickly snuffed out by the realization that no creature could possibly match her excellence, it wasn\xe2\x80\x99t their fault that she was just...superior.  Flawless genetics and years of tireless practice had honed the ultimate conduit of pure unicorn power.\r\n\r\n\xe2\x80\x9cBEHOLD!\xe2\x80\x9d she shouted, causing everypony below to look up in awe,  \xe2\x80\x9cThe Great and Powerful TRIXIE in all of her electrifying majesty has ARRIVED!\xe2\x80\x9d\r\n\r\nAn eruption of dazzling fireworks and lightning bolts lit up the night sky, followed by the thunderous sound of thousands of stamping hooves and cheering equines.  Trixie illuminated the entire cliff face with a soft purple glow.  The magical light accented her impeccable coat.\r\n\r\n\xe2\x80\x9cSimpletons of Equestria!\xe2\x80\x9d She exclaimed, with her most powerful vocal enhancement spell, \xe2\x80\x9cThe Great and Powerful Trixie is about to ROCK YOUR WORLD!\xe2\x80\x9d\xc2\xa0\r\n\r\nUnknown to Trixie,  the ground below her was weakening from the constant vibrations of the excited crowd below.  Completely absorbed in her magic, she failed to notice the small splinter of broken earth creeping up the side of her earthen platform.\r\n\r\nRight as she was about to reach the climax of her epic Ursa Major VS Dragon light show in the sky above, a massive shift jarred her out of concentration. mass of mindless pony followers, her perfectly trimmed tail and billowing cape flowing in the wind.&nbsp;&nbsp;A small tinge of pity for the hoard below was quickly snuffed out by the realization that no creature could possibly match her excellence, it wasn\xe2\x80\x99t their fault that she was just...superior.&nbsp;&nbsp;Flawless genetics and years of tireless practice had honed the ultimate conduit of pure unicorn power.</p><p class="double">\xe2\x80\x9cBEHOLD!\xe2\x80\x9d she shouted, causing everypony below to look up in awe,&nbsp;&nbsp;\xe2\x80\x9cThe Great and Powerful TRIXIE in all of her electrifying majesty has ARRIVED!\xe2\x80\x9d</p><p class="double">An eruption of dazzling fireworks and lightning bolts lit up the night sky, followed by the thunderous sound of thousands of stamping hooves and cheering equines.&nbsp;&nbsp;Trixie illuminated the entire cliff face with a soft purple glow.&nbsp;&nbsp;The magical light accented her impeccable coat.</p><p class="double">\xe2\x80\x9cSimpletons of Equestria!\xe2\x80\x9d She exclaimed, with her most powerful vocal enhancement spell, \xe2\x80\x9cThe Great and Powerful Trixie is about to ROCK YOUR WORLD!\xe2\x80\x9d\xc2\xa0</p><p class="double">Unknown to Trixie,&nbsp;&nbsp;the ground below her was weakening from the constant vibrations of the excited crowd below.&nbsp;&nbsp;Completely absorbed in her magic, she failed to notice the small splinter of broken earth creeping up the side of her earthen platform.</p><p class="double">Right as she was about to reach the climax of her epic Ursa Major VS Dragon light show in the sky above, a massive shift jarred her out of concentration.&nbsp;&nbsp;Before she could even register what was happening, the entire cliff face gave way,&nbsp;&nbsp;cascading freely toward the valley far below.&nbsp;&nbsp;Flashes of her past flickered through her mind, as the ground rushed toward her..</p><p class="double">***</p><p proudly upon a cliff high above a mass of mindless pony followers, her perfectly trimmed tail and billowing cape flowing in the wind.&nbsp;&nbsp;A small tinge of pity for the hoard below was quickly snuffed out by the realization that no creature could possibly match her excellence, it wasn\xe2\x80\x99t their fault that she was just...superior.&nbsp;&nbsp;Flawless genetics and years of tireless practice had honed the ultimate conduit of pure unicorn power.</p><p class="double">\xe2\x80\x9cBEHOLD!\xe2\x80\x9d she shouted, causing everypony below to look up in awe,&nbsp;&nbsp;\xe2\x80\x9cThe Great and Powerful TRIXIE in all of her electrifying majesty has ARRIVED!\xe2\x80\x9d</p><p class="double">An eruption of dazzling fireworks and lightning bolts lit up the night sky, followed by the thunderous sound of thousands of stamping hooves and cheering equines.&nbsp;&nbsp;Trixie illuminated the entire cliff face with a soft purple glow.&nbsp;&nbsp;The magical light accented her impeccable coat.</p><p class="double">\xe2\x80\x9cSimpletons of Equestria!\xe2\x80\x9d She exclaimed, with her most powerful vocal enhancement spell, \xe2\x80\x9cThe Great and Powerful Trixie is about to ROCK YOUR WORLD!\xe2\x80\x9d\xc2\xa0</p><p class="double">Unknown to Trixie,&nbsp;&nbsp;the ground below her was weakening from the constant vibrations of the excited crowd below.&nbsp;&nbsp;Completely absorbed in her magic, she failed to notice the small splinter of broken earth creeping up the side of her earthen platform.</p><p class="double">Right as she was about to reach the climax of her epic Ursa Major VS Dragon light show in the sky above, a massive shift jarred her out of concentration.&nbsp;&nbsp;Before she could even register what was happening, the entire cliff face gave way,&nbsp;&nbsp;cascading freely toward the valley far below.&nbsp;&nbsp;Flashes of her past flickered through her mind, as the ground rushed toward her..</p><p class="double">***</p><p class="double">She woke up, tangled in sheets on the floor next to the bed.</p><p class="double">\xe2\x80\x9cUgghh... Dammit Trixie!\xe2\x80\x9d, the purple mare glared down at her blue counterpart on the floor \xe2\x80\x9cThis is the third time this week! Trixie stood proudly upon a cliff high above a mass of mindless pony followers, her perfectly trimmed tail and billowing cape flowing in the wind.&nbsp;&nbsp;A small tinge of pity for the hoard below was quickly snuffed out by the realization that no creature could possibly match her excellence, it wasn\xe2\x80\x99t their fault that she was just...superior.&nbsp;&nbsp;Flawless genetics and years of tireless practice had honed the ultimate conduit of pure unicorn power.</p><p class="double">\xe2\x80\x9cBEHOLD!\xe2\x80\x9d she shouted, causing everypony below to look up in awe,&nbsp;&nbsp;\xe2\x80\x9cThe Great and Powerful TRIXIE in all of her electrifying majesty has ARRIVED!\xe2\x80\x9d</p><p class="double">An eruption of dazzling fireworks and lightning bolts lit up the night sky, followed by the thunderous sound of thousands of stamping hooves and cheering equines.&nbsp;&nbsp;Trixie illuminated the entire cliff face with a soft purple glow.&nbsp;&nbsp;The magical light accented her impeccable coat.</p><p class="double">\xe2\x80\x9cSimpletons of Equestria!\xe2\x80\x9d She exclaimed, with her most powerful vocal enhancement spell, \xe2\x80\x9cThe Great and Powerful Trixie is about to ROCK YOUR WORLD!\xe2\x80\x9d\xc2\xa0</p><p class="double">Unknown to Trixie,&nbsp;&nbsp;the ground below her was weakening from the constant vibrations of the excited crowd below.&nbsp;&nbsp;Completely absorbed in her magic, she failed to notice the small splinter of broken earth creeping up the side of her earthen platform.</p><p class="double">Right as she was about to reach the climax of her epic Ursa Major VS Dragon light show in the sky above, a massive shift jarred her out of concentration.&nbsp;&nbsp;Before she could even register what was happening, the entire cliff face gave way,&nbsp;&nbsp;cascading freely toward the valley far below.&nbsp;&nbsp;Flashes of her past flickered through her mind, as the ground rushed toward her..</p><p A small tinge of pity for the hoard below was quickly snuffed out by the realization that no creature could possibly match her excellence, it wasn\xe2\x80\x99t their fault that she was just...superior.  Flawless genetics and years of tireless practice had honed the ultimate conduit of pure unicorn power.\r\n\r\n\xe2\x80\x9cBEHOLD!\xe2\x80\x9d she shouted, causing everypony below to look up in awe,  \xe2\x80\x9cThe Great and Powerful TRIXIE in all of her electrifying majesty has ARRIVED!\xe2\x80\x9d\r\n\r\nAn eruption of dazzling fireworks and lightning bolts lit up the night sky, followed by the thunderous sound of thousands of stamping hooves and cheering equines. about to reach the climax of her epic Ursa Major VS Dragon light show in the sky above, a massive shift jarred her out of concentration.&nbsp;&nbsp;Before she could even register what was happening, class="double">***</p><p class="double">She woke up, tangled in sheets on the floor next to the bed.</p><p class="double">\xe2\x80\x9cUgghh... Dammit Trixie!\xe2\x80\x9d, the purple mare glared down at her blue counterpart on the floor \xe2\x80\x9cThis is the third time this week! Can\xe2\x80\x99t we have just ONE night of uninterrupted sleep?\xe2\x80\x9d</b></u></i></span></center></blockquote></p>\t</body>\n</html>', 'values': ['//------------------------------//\n// Chapter 1// Story: The Greatest Equine Who has Ever Lived!// by Sethisto//------------------------------//\n\nThe Great and Powerful Trixie stood proudly upon a cliff high above a mass of mindless pony followers, her perfectly trimmed tail and billowing cape flowing in the wind.  A small tinge of pity for the hoard below was quickly snuffed out by the realization that no creature could possibly match her excellence, it wasn\xe2\x80\x99t their fault that she was just...superior.  Flawless genetics and years of tireless practice had honed the ultimate conduit of pure unicorn power.\r\n\r\n\xe2\x80\x9cBEHOLD!\xe2\x80\x9d she shouted, causing everypony below to look up in awe,  \xe2\x80\x9cThe Great and Powerful TRIXIE in all of her electrifying majesty has ARRIVED!\xe2\x80\x9d\r\n\r\nAn eruption of dazzling fireworks and lightning bolts lit up the night sky, followed by the thunderous sound of thousands of stamping hooves and cheering equines.  Trixie illuminated the entire cliff face with a soft purple glow.  The magical light accented her impeccable coat.\r\n\r\n\xe2\x80\x9cSimpletons of Equestria!\xe2\x80\x9d She exclaimed, with her most powerful vocal enhancement spell, \xe2\x80\x9cThe Great and Powerful Trixie is about to ROCK YOUR WORLD!\xe2\x80\x9d\xc2\xa0\r\n\r\nUnknown to Trixie,  the ground below her was weakening from the constant vibrations of the excited crowd below.  Completely absorbed in her magic, she failed to notice the small splinter of broken earth creeping up the side of her earthen platform.\r\n\r\nRight as she was about to reach the climax of her epic Ursa Major VS Dragon light show in the sky above, a massive shift jarred her out of concentration. Ursa Major VS Dragon light show in the sky above, a massive shift jarred her out of concentration.&nbsp;&nbsp;Before she could even register what was happening, the entire cliff face gave way,&nbsp;&nbsp;cascading freely toward the valley far below.&nbsp;&nbsp;Flashes of her past flickered through her mind, as the ground rushed toward her..</p><p class="double">***</p><p class="double">She woke up, tangled in sheets on the floor next to the bed.</p><p class="double">\xe2\x80\x9cUgghh... Dammit Trixie!\xe2\x80\x9d, the purple mare glared down at her blue counterpart on the floor \xe2\x80\x9cThis is the third time this week! was quickly snuffed out by the realization that no creature could possibly match her excellence, it wasn\xe2\x80\x99t their fault that she was just...superior.&nbsp;&nbsp;Flawless genetics and years Before she could even register what was happening, the entire cliff face gave way,  cascading freely toward the valley far below.  Flashes of her past flickered through her mind, as the ground rushed toward her..\r\n\r\n***\r\n\r\nShe woke up, tangled in sheets on the floor next to the bed.\r\n\r\n\xe2\x80\x9cUgghh... Dammit Trixie!\xe2\x80\x9d, the purple mare glared down at her blue counterpart on the floor \xe2\x80\x9cThis is the third time this week! no creature could possibly match her excellence, it wasn\xe2\x80\x99t their fault that she was just...superior.&nbsp;&nbsp;Flawless genetics and years of tireless practice had honed the ultimate conduit of pure unicorn power.</p><p class="double">\xe2\x80\x9cBEHOLD!\xe2\x80\x9d she shouted, causing everypony below to look up in awe,&nbsp;&nbsp;\xe2\x80\x9cThe Great and Powerful TRIXIE in all class="double">\xe2\x80\x9cSimpletons of Equestria!\xe2\x80\x9d She exclaimed, with her most powerful vocal enhancement spell, \xe2\x80\x9cThe Great and Powerful Trixie is about to ROCK YOUR 2015-02-23 12:03:02,490 - DEBUG - {'version': 1, 'chapter_number': 1, 'fields': ['chapter_text', 'chapter_number', 'parent_chapter_id', 'chapter_html', 'version', 'parent_story_id'], 'chapter_to_insert': {'chapter_text': "//------------------------------//\n// Chapter 1 (*)// Story: Valkyrie// by Flicka Ravenhide//------------------------------//\n\n\tThe world was a battlefield.\r\n\r\n\tThere was no contesting that simple fact, and nothing else could even come close to describing the raw destruction. Long gouges had been dug into the earth, a testament to massive weapons of war and their awe inducing power. Trees had been stripped completely bare of everything save their bark, a result of chaotic magical energies that yet still swirled in the air. Pockets of flame guttered here and there, feeding off of long charred grass and other foliage. Remnants of buildings dotted the landscape spasmodically, some flickering with flames, others reduced to naught but rubble. The sky was a sickly color, an unholy orange combination that was the result of the sun and the moon sharing the sky at the same time; neither refused to lower for the other. The cold twinkling of stars could also be seen in the acidic atmosphere, silent observers to the massive struggles that had occurred below.\r\n\r\n\tAnd among it all, Princess Luna yet stood proud, unwavering. Her foe, consumed by madness and hatred, had proven more resilient than originally anticipated. She had hoped, before all of this had began, that she would have been able to end this chaos before it spread to her ponies. Naturally, that never happened, and the end result was the war torn nation around her. Ponies on both sides had fought and died, father and son, mother and daughter. On one side, those still completely loyal to her and the true Equestrian Crown. On the other side, those loyal to the usurper\xe2\x80\xa6 Corona Flare. Both had paid the cost of war twice over, and at this point in time Luna would be thankful for this to end any time within the next several years.\r\n\r\n\tThe beating of tired wings behind her heralded the arrival of another pony to the scene. Princess Luna knew, before she even turned around, who the mare was. No other pony felt like this one did, and as Luna glanced to her right her instincts were confirmed. Her Valkyrie and a fellow ruler had once more made it to her side, and as Luna turned to the other mare she felt her heart clench. How the other pony was still standing was a mystery to the dark princess. The once proud armor was badly damaged, restricting movement and breathing, if the harsh whistling was anything to go by. The front lower chest of it was crushed inward, and there were perforations along the rest of the suit that trailed dried blood. Above the caved in section, the torc built into the armor still gleamed with bright power. The other princess\xe2\x80\x99 weapon had long since been lost in the desperate struggle, undoubtedly for good. For long moments both princesses stood there, one armored from head to hoof, the other protected by the lightest armor she could forge and a few wards. Finally, Luna spoke.\r\n\r\n\t\xe2\x80\x9cYou look pretty bad, Valkyrie. You should have a medic look at you, just in case.\xe2\x80\x9d\r\n\r\n\tThe Valkyrie shook her head gently. \xe2\x80\x9cNay. My alicorn magic has already healed the worst of the wounds, and it would take a blacksmith of considerable skill to pry this blasted armor off of me. We simply do not have the time.\xe2\x80\x9d\r\n\r\n\tLuna faced south again. \xe2\x80\x9cWe do not. Are you sure this plan of yours will work?\xe2\x80\x9d\r\n\r\n\t\xe2\x80\x9cIt\xe2\x80\x99ll work. I\xe2\x80\x99ve always been more powerful than she, despite her recent connection. She won\xe2\x80\x99t even be able to break the spell when I begin its casting. Once it is complete, she\xe2\x80\x99ll be gone. And you\xe2\x80\x99ll be able to rebuild our beloved country.\xe2\x80\x9d\r\n\r\n\t\xe2\x80\x9cBut what about you? How am I supposed to rebuild as the sole ruler of Equestria?  I need you, need you here to help me. You can\xe2\x80\x99t leave me here alone!\xe2\x80\x9d Princess Luna\xe2\x80\x99s voice took on a despairing note.\r\n\r\n\tThe other princess nuzzled up beneath Luna\xe2\x80\x99s chin, giving the mare a quick kiss. \xe2\x80\x9cI can and I will, Luna. It\xe2\x80\x99s the only way to stop her. It may not seem like much, but I can give you time to rebuild. Time to gather your strength for her eventual return, for not even my power can hold her for eternity. And I doubt I\xe2\x80\x99ll be gone forever, you know. That\xe2\x80\x99s not how Harmony works. The world needs its defenders, and I\xe2\x80\x99m one of them. I\xe2\x80\x99ll return eventually, I\xe2\x80\x99m sure of it.\xe2\x80\x9d\r\n\r\n\t\xe2\x80\x9cI still don\xe2\x80\x99t want you to go.\xe2\x80\x9d Luna pouted.\r\n\r\n\tThe Valkyrie was about to reply before she was interrupted by more wingbeats. There was a blinding flare of light, and then there she was. Corona Flare. The same maniacal pony they\xe2\x80\x99ve been fighting for the past who knew how long. The pony they had once viewed as a friend, as an equal. Even gazing upon her now, neither princess could detect a trace of Celestia within the hellish creature opposite them. The once pristine white coat was now blood scarlet, as though it had been reforged in the deepest depths of the sun. The magnificent pastel mane resembled flames from the pits of Tartarus, blinding orange and yellow and burning anything it neared. Oddly enough, the traitor\xe2\x80\x99s cutie mark never changed, merely had its colors inverted to fit the new scheme. And lastly, the legendary armor of the Princess of the Sun had changed, encompassing vital areas while leaving the legs and underbelly bare. Flare stalked forward a few paces, fangs bared.\r\n\r\n\t\xe2\x80\x9cThat is far enough, monster.\xe2\x80\x9d The Valkyrie spoke firmly. Just for a moment, the slight wheezing was gone.\r\n\r\n\tThe answer was a resounding cackle that seemed to rebound off the very air. \xe2\x80\x9cMe? A monster? Have you looked at yourself lately? If I am a monster, what does that make you, the vaunted \xe2\x80\x98defender of Equestria\xe2\x80\x99?\xe2\x80\x9d\r\n\r\n\t\xe2\x80\x9cIt makes me a better pony than you. I am willing to do what is necessary to preserve our species.\xe2\x80\x9d\r\n\r\n\t\xe2\x80\x9cWhich is why I tossed you about like a rag doll, I\xe2\x80\x99m sure. I\xe2\x80\x99m honestly surprised you yet live. I was positive I had killed you in that last battle. But no matter. I can just do it now, and have it over with.\xe2\x80\x9d Flare inched forward again, but paused when the ring of magic rent the air.\r\n\r\n\t\xe2\x80\x9cNo. You will no longer harm the ponies we swore to protect, Tia. I forbid it. You will answer for your crimes. You have harmed thousands. You slaughtered my closest friend, your own wife. And then you have the audacity to refuse to lower the sun, to turn our land into a barren nightmare.\xe2\x80\x9d Magic began to once more permeate the atmosphere as the Valkyrie prepared her spell. Princess Luna found herself taking several steps back; Despite the fact that the demented pony before them was her sister, right now this was not her fight any more.\r\n\r\n\tCorona\xe2\x80\x99s only response was to charge the other princess with a cry of rage, aiming to stop the spell from reaching completion. The armored pony stood her ground, setting her shoulder. Corona slammed into the alicorn, and was thrown back as still active wards flared to life. She came on again, horn lowered, intending to gore on the spot. The Valkyrie parried, lifting a hoof up casually to knock aside the deadly point. As Corona whirled once more, she finally spoke. \xe2\x80\x9cEvery thing I did\xe2\x80\xa6 was for Equestria!\xe2\x80\x9d And she came on again, thundering towards her opponent once more.\r\n\r\n\tThe Valkyrie grabbed ahold of Corona\xe2\x80\x99s head in a vice grip and tossed the rampaging daymare over her shoulder. \xe2\x80\x9cYou failed Equestria! You forsake the promises we swore!\xe2\x80\x9d\r\n\r\n\tCorona fired a blast from her horn, catching the Valkyrie in the shoulder and causing the mare to stumble as her wards fizzled. The daymare pounced upon this opportunity, ramming a shod hoof against her foe\xe2\x80\x99s helmet. She then pressed her advantage, raining blow after blow onto the head. She punctuated each attack with words. \xe2\x80\x9cYou gave Magic to me! Me! And then you left me! Said you didn\xe2\x80\x99t want it, then left me with so much power! You forsook Equestria, and left me to pick up your pieces! If anything, you failed me!\xe2\x80\x9d \r\n\r\n\tCorona\xe2\x80\x99s horn flared, then proceeded to toss the Valkyrie away. She crashed through a building. \xe2\x80\x9cYou never had the strength of a true princess.\xe2\x80\x9d\r\n\r\n\tThe other alicorn picked her way out of the ruined structure, limping. The wheezing was back, louder than before. \xe2\x80\x9cI do not rely on strength alone, Celestia. My power is all around you. Just begging to be used.\xe2\x80\x9d\r\n\r\n\tIt was then that the daymare discovered her mistake. Throughout the entire fight, the Valkyrie\xe2\x80\x99s horn had never ceased its glow. Now it grew to blinding proportions, causing even Corona to falter. When the daymare went to take a step back, however, she discovered she was trapped inside a dome. Stone rose up around the traitor, crushing her in a grip she couldn\xe2\x80\x99t hope to escape. Her horn flashed dangerously, trying to dispell the magic. Nothing worked. Desperate to have the last word, she spoke in a sibilant hiss. \xe2\x80\x9cYou made me what I am.\xe2\x80\x9d\r\n\r\n\tThe Valkyrie stared at her enemy coldly, before stepping into the sphere of magic. \xe2\x80\x9cNo. You chose your own destiny. As have I. Your sentence is hereby thus: You are banished into the deepest pits of the celestial body you control for a thousand years. You will stay there, and come to terms with all that you have done. And to ensure your sentence will be carried out, I hereby sacrifice my own mortal shell to chain you to your prison.\xe2\x80\x9d\r\n\r\n\tAt these final words, a beam of light suddenly fell from the heavens, vaporizing everything inside the bubble. When the glow died, nothing remained save the Valkyrie\xe2\x80\x99s armor, and nothing could be heard aside from Luna\xe2\x80\x99s keening cry of anguish.\r\n\r\n<<((*))>>\t\r\n\r\n\t\r\n\r\n\t\xe2\x80\x9cCome on, Twilight. At least try to eat something. Tomorrow is an important day for all of us, and you can\xe2\x80\x99t pass out from hunger on such a big day!\xe2\x80\x9d Pinkie Pie, outrageously pink with the puffiest mane and tail imaginable, jabbed a hoof at Twilight Sparkle\xe2\x80\x99s thus far untouched plate. Twilight tried to return her smile, but found that her lips just couldn\xe2\x80\x99t form the simple movement. Twilight glanced down at the food set before her, picking at pieces of it with her magenta tinged magic. The plate was pile high with her favorite foods: Stacks of hayfries, a daisy sunflower sandwich, and several greens and fruits besides. Tonight, however, Twilight couldn\xe2\x80\x99t simply fall upon her food like she had in the past.\r\n\r\n\tPinkie Pie\xe2\x80\x99s words rang true. Tomorrow would decide the future for Twilight Sparkle and the rest of the Canterlot Orphans. Tomorrow was Career Day, and would determine exactly what\xe2\x80\x94if any\xe2\x80\x94future Equestria had in store for her. Deep, deep down inside, the purple unicorn just knew she was being silly. From levitation to teleportation to complex spell casting, Twilight had studied them all and only wanted more. There was no way that Luna\xe2\x80\x99s School for Gifted Unicorns would turn her down. She would become a mage, one of the powerful defenders of Equestria, ready to serve the Crown in times of need. She was yanked from her daydreams by another voice.\r\n\r\n\t\xe2\x80\x9cAh think she\xe2\x80\x99s just nervous,\xe2\x80\x9d Applejack tossed down her fork and tipped her faithful Stetson forward, shading her emerald eyes a bit. Nothing made Applejack happier than to be outside in the heat of the Sun, tending apple trees and farming equipment. Twilight knew that Applejack was going to head directly into the Equestrian Rangers; an elite group of soldiers who farmed for a living, but acted as a defensive buffer to the Crown. With muscles like Applejack\xe2\x80\x99s, the mare would be suited for little else. \xe2\x80\x9cNerves are a dreadful thing, Twi. Don\xe2\x80\x99t let em distract ya.\xe2\x80\x9d\r\n\r\n\t\xe2\x80\x9cI\xe2\x80\x99m not nervous,\xe2\x80\x9d Twilight protested, twirling a fork in her magic. She realized as she did so that this was a mistake.\r\n\r\n\tRainbow Dash glanced up from her own loaded plate, a comment already formed. \xe2\x80\x9cOf course Twilight is nervous! After all, who is going to want a unicorn mare that spends all of her time studying?\xe2\x80\x9d Sleek and smooth, Rainbow Dash was Wonderbolt material.\r\n\r\n\t\xe2\x80\x9cI\xe2\x80\x99m sure we're all nervous,\xe2\x80\x9d Fluttershy peeked her head out from behind her soft pink mane and offered a rare smile to Twilight, which the unicorn managed to return this time. Fluttershy lived up to her name, almost scared of her own shadow and too shy to make friends outside of her fellow Orphans. Her trusty first aid kit rested at the end of their table, within easy reach. As far as Twilight knew, Fluttershy never went anywhere without it.\r\n\r\n\t\xe2\x80\x9cWell, I\xe2\x80\x99m not!\xe2\x80\x9d Pinkie Pie proclaimed exuberantly. Twilight arched an eyebrow at her, which caused the bouncy mare to giggle. Pinkie Pie would almost certainly gravitate towards Equestria Intelligence. With a knack for baking or cooking, Pinkie already had the perfect alias to her name. Pinkie reached out an impossibly long hoof, almost as long as she was tall, and scooped up a doughnut from the platter of a passing waiter. She then proceeded to shove the entire thing into her mouth and swallow it whole.\r\n\r\n\tTwilight sighed slightly, struggling to take her mind off tomorrow, and tried to become more active with her fellow Canterlot Orphans.  The Canterlot Orphans were just that: orphan fillies and colts whose parents had died in service to the Crown. Her Royal Highness Princess Luna raised these foals as Children of Canterlot, offering them a place to stay and giving them a small stipend from the Treasury. A vast majority of the Orphans were taken in by other Canterlot nobles\xe2\x80\x94with the recent exception being Twilight Sparkle. As young as she was, the aspiring mage knew exactly why, too: Freifrau Twilena Star Sparkle av Twinkle was one of the last living descendants of one of the most important and influential Houses. As such, other nobility only saw her as a marriage contract that would allow them to gain more peerage. After turning her third foster family into a trio of toads, Princess Luna herself deigned to give Twilena living space within Canterlot. Twilight mentally shuddered. She hated her real name, much preferring the informal Twilight Sparkle.\r\n\r\n\tDespite her attempt to ward off thoughts of her slight predicament, Twilight\xe2\x80\x99s mind stubbornly refused to let it go. It was hard, being one of the last lines of one of the only Houses devoted purely to the Crown. It was even harder because she was a mare. Among other nobility in Canterlot, it was expected that Twilight Sparkle marry into some other House and raise foals. That should be her sole purpose, and nothing more. Twilight, however, had other plans. Being officially recognized by the Crown as a Canterlot Orphan, Twilight could participate in Career Day if she so chose. Once she turned seventeen, Twilight had a decision to make: She could both fold to the wishes of other nobility and find some stuffy old snob to marry, or she could find her own place in the world.  It was Twilight\xe2\x80\x99s every intention to do the latter. Career Day would provide that opportunity. When tomorrow comes, so too will the Masters of various branches of Equestria services. Should a Master Mage decide to accept Twilight Sparkle as an apprentice, she\xe2\x80\x99ll be able to fully leave the plotting of other nobles behind. It would be tough going for a while, but doable. She\xe2\x80\x99ll have at least two years of learning at Luna\xe2\x80\x99s School for Gifted Unicorns, then another two years of study under her Master. After that, if her Master deems her competent enough, she\xe2\x80\x99ll be out on her own, patrolling Equestria\xe2\x80\x99s borders and keeping an eye on their enemies.\r\n\r\n\tTwilight stood up from her still untouched plate suddenly. Ignoring the questions of the other Orphans, Twilight exited the palace kitchens and meandered down a random hallway. She knew her friends were only trying to help comfort her (maybe with the exception of Rainbow), but at the moment Twilight did not want their condolences. Maybe Rainbow was right after all, as loath as Twilight wanted to admit it. The reclusive unicorn spent so much of her time locked away studying, it was a wonder any Master would even look twice at her. She could barely even classify her fellow Orphans as actual friends. The general defense against the schemes attempted to be woven around her was to usually lock herself away with her books. Doing so also helped hide the fact that she was still a Blank Flank.\r\n\r\n\tThe thought of still not having her cutie mark caused Twilight to glance longingly back at her bare flanks. Canterlot Orphans almost never received their cutie marks until after Career Day, meaning they were usually the oldest ponies to never have one. As such, this lead to a lot of ridicule from much younger colts and fillies who already knew what they were going to do with their life. So yes, locking herself away in her own personal tower with her books was often a good idea. At least the books would not laugh at her. Twilight scowled slightly, kicking at the marble floor with a forehoof. She did not want to go back and attempt to eat, or to be surrounded by her Orphan-mates. Even her books did not beckon to her like they normally did. Unable to decide what to do now or even what she wanted to do, Twilight headed for the one place she could always find peace and quiet.\r\n\r\n\tThe Royal Gardens were like a second home to Twilight, coming only after her books and the library. The gardens were so vast, Twilight had several places she could go for total solitude, away from other ponies. Twilight\xe2\x80\x99s hooves rang out on cobblestone as she stepped through the archway leading into the main lobby of the palace. The two pegasus guards stationed at either side nodded respectfully at the Orphan as she walked sedately past, heading directly to the Gardens off to one side. As Twilight passed the boundary into the Gardens proper, she let out a heartfelt sigh of relief. Her tense form relaxed, and her breathing came easier. It was always like this in the Gardens. The smell of various plants. The soothing shade of towering trees, blotting out the moonlight. The soft symphony of insects providing a pleasant background noise. Even the occasional wild rabbit or bird helped create a potent mix that struck a calming chord deep within Twilight. She often came here when plagued by thoughts of the past and future, and every time this magical place put her at ease.\r\n\r\n\tTwilight immediately took a right, headed off to an obscure corner of the garden. Right now, she only sought peace and quiet. She did not want to think, or to make small talk, or anything. She just wanted to sit and do absolutely nothing but breathe in the crisp atmosphere around her. Twilight trotted right up to a small stone bench overshadowed by towering oaks. A slight outline that was whiter than the rest of the stone, matching her body when curled up, was a testament to how often the young unicorn came to this very bench. She clambered up onto the coolness and curled up, matching the indentation perfectly. She closed her eyes and just lay there, still as the rock she rested on. She barely even moved as she breathed. Even if somepony walked right by her, they would only see her if she moved or they tried to sit on her.\r\n\r\n\tAs Twilight lay there, in a state halfway between sleep and awareness, the lights in Canterlot Palace started to extinguish. One by one the many windows in the palace went out. Twilight\xe2\x80\x99s ear flicked as she heard Pinkie Pie calling her name in the distance, but Twilight ignored the call. Eventually, there was only one light left shining in the palace, high above her. She could see it with her magical sight, and knew that it belonged to Princess Luna, ruler of Equestria. Undoubtedly the Monarch was still awake, poring over papers and other important documents. The Princess often stayed up late, taking care of business so that she could continue to run Equestria as smoothly as possible.\r\n\r\n\tSoon, however, even the light in Princess Luna\xe2\x80\x99s chamber went out as the Royal prepared for some sleep before reawakening to brighten the moon, signalling the start of a new night. Still, Twilight Sparkle remained on her bench, uncaring and unthinking. Slowly but surely, the gifted unicorn began to expand her consciousness outward. When she had first began training herself in turning her mind into a corporeal form, Twilight had barely managed to expand a few feet from her body. Practicing again and again allowed the purple mare to expand a little farther each time. Now, she could extend her consciousness well past the garden boundaries, and drape it across all of Canterlot Palace. She could feel almost everything like this. The bright pinpricks of her fellow Orphans were the easiest to pick out, as she spent a good deal of her time with them, whenever she was not studying. Each were currently in their rooms, wrapped in easy slumber. Twilight\xe2\x80\x99s lips curved into a smile as she gently caressed each of them in turn. Despite what she told herself, Twilight had really come to care for the other Orphans... Even Rainbow Dash, as brash and cocky as she was.\r\n\r\n\tNext, Twilight sought out the familiar spark that was her brother. Captain Shining Armor was an orphan too, but not recognized as such by the Crown any more. He joined the Guard on his Career day, and has since risen up through the ranks of the Canterlot Guard with unmatched determination and devotion. Thanks to Shining\xe2\x80\x99s own ceaseless duties and Twilight\xe2\x80\x99s studying, the siblings have not had much time to visit each other often. Twilight missed her brother dearly. He was the only family she had left, and fully supported his younger sister in her quest to be an independent mare. On several occasions Shining had personally offered to step in and take care of a particularly nasty noble. However, thanks to Twilight\xe2\x80\x99s reclusiveness to ponies who were not fellow Orphans, Shining never really had to do much more than flex his military muscles.\r\n\r\n\tWith a small sigh of exertion, Twilight finally returned to her body. She clambered to her hooves, wincing at the slight cramps from remaining still for so long. In roughly seven hours she would be standing before the Masters, who would determine her future. Quickly and quietly, Twilight fled back to her tower, still struggling to keep her mind off the future and what it would hold. The young mare collapsed upon her bed with a grunt, where sleep finally took a hold of her tired mind.\r\n\r\n", 'chapter_number': 1, 'parent_chapter_id': 320259, 'chapter_html': '<html>\n\t<head>\n\t\t<head><meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=UTF-8"/></head>\n\t</head>\n\t<body>\n\t\t<h1><a href="http://www.fimfiction.net/story/104188/valkyrie">Valkyrie</a></h1>\n\t\t<h2>by <a href="http://www.fimfiction.net/user/Flicka+Ravenhide">Flicka Ravenhide</a></h2>\n\n\t\t<hr />\n\n\t\t<a name=\'1\'></a><h3>Chapter 1 (*)</h3>\n<p class=\'indented\'>The world was a battlefield.</p><p class="indented double">There was no contesting that simple fact, and nothing else could even come close to describing the raw destruction. Long gouges had been dug into the earth, a testament to massive weapons of war and their awe inducing power. Trees had been stripped completely bare of everything save their bark, a result of chaotic magical energies that yet still swirled in the air. Pockets of flame guttered here and there, feeding off of long charred grass and other foliage. Remnants of buildings dotted the landscape spasmodically, some flickering with flames, others reduced to naught but rubble. The sky was a sickly color, an unholy orange combination that was the result of the sun and the moon sharing the sky at the same time; neither refused to lower for the other. The cold twinkling of stars could also be seen in the acidic atmosphere, silent observers to the massive struggles that had occurred below.</p><p class="indented double">And among it all, Princess Luna yet stood proud, unwavering. Her foe, consumed by madness and hatred, had proven more resilient than originally anticipated. She had hoped, before all of this had began, that she would have been able to end this chaos before it spread to her ponies. Naturally, that never happened, and the end result was the war torn nation around her. Ponies on both sides had fought and died, father and son, mother and daughter. On one side, those still completely loyal to her and the true Equestrian Crown. On the other side, those loyal to the usurper\xe2\x80\xa6 Corona Flare. Both had paid the cost of war twice over, and at this point in time Luna would be thankful for this to end any time within the next several years.</p><p class="indented double">The beating of tired wings behind her heralded the arrival of another pony to the scene. Princess Luna knew, before she even turned around, who the mare was. No other pony felt like this one did, and as Luna glanced to her right her instincts were confirmed. Her Valkyrie and a fellow ruler had once more made it to her side, and as Luna turned to the other mare she felt her heart clench. How the other pony was still standing was a mystery to the dark princess. The once proud armor was badly damaged, restricting movement and breathing, if the harsh whistling was anything to go by. The front lower chest of it was crushed inward, and there were perforations along the rest of the suit that trailed dried blood. Above the caved in section, the torc built into the armor still gleamed with bright power. The other princess\xe2\x80\x99 weapon had long since been lost in the desperate struggle, undoubtedly for good. For long moments both princesses stood there, one armored from head to hoof, the other protected by the lightest armor she could forge and a few wards. Finally, Luna spoke.</p><p class="indented double">\xe2\x80\x9cYou look pretty bad, Valkyrie. You should have a medic look at you, just in case.\xe2\x80\x9d</p><p class="indented double">The Valkyrie shook her head gently. \xe2\x80\x9cNay. My alicorn magic has already healed the worst of the wounds, and it would take a blacksmith of considerable skill to pry this blasted armor off of me. We simply do not have the time.\xe2\x80\x9d</p><p class="indented double">Luna faced south again. \xe2\x80\x9cWe do not. Are you sure this plan of yours will work?\xe2\x80\x9d</p><p class="indented double">\xe2\x80\x9cIt\xe2\x80\x99ll work. I\xe2\x80\x99ve always been more powerful than she, despite her recent connection. She won\xe2\x80\x99t even be able to break the spell when I begin its casting. Once it is complete, she\xe2\x80\x99ll be gone. And you\xe2\x80\x99ll be able to rebuild our beloved country.\xe2\x80\x9d</p><p class="indented double">\xe2\x80\x9cBut what about <i>you</i>? How am I supposed to rebuild as the sole ruler of Equestria?&nbsp;&nbsp;I need you, need you here to help me. You can\xe2\x80\x99t leave me here alone!\xe2\x80\x9d Princess Luna\xe2\x80\x99s voice took on a despairing note.</p><p class="indented double">The other princess nuzzled up beneath Luna\xe2\x80\x99s chin, giving the mare a quick kiss. \xe2\x80\x9cI can and I will, Luna. It\xe2\x80\x99s the only way to stop her. It may not seem like much, but I can give you time to rebuild. Time to gather your strength for her eventual return, for not even my power can hold her for eternity. And I doubt I\xe2\x80\x99ll be gone forever, you know. That\xe2\x80\x99s not how Harmony works. The world needs its defenders, and I\xe2\x80\x99m one of them. I\xe2\x80\x99ll return eventually, I\xe2\x80\x99m sure of it.\xe2\x80\x9d</p><p class="indented double">\xe2\x80\x9cI still don\xe2\x80\x99t want you to go.\xe2\x80\x9d Luna pouted.</p><p class="indented double">The Valkyrie was about to reply before she was interrupted by more wingbeats. There was a blinding flare of light, and then there she was. Corona Flare. The same maniacal pony they\xe2\x80\x99ve been fighting for the past who knew how long. The pony they had once viewed as a friend, as an equal. Even gazing upon her now, neither princess could detect a trace of Celestia within the hellish creature opposite them. The once pristine white coat was now blood scarlet, as though it had been reforged in the deepest depths of the sun. The magnificent pastel mane resembled flames from the pits of Tartarus, blinding orange and yellow and burning anything it neared. Oddly enough, the traitor\xe2\x80\x99s cutie mark never changed, merely had its colors inverted to fit the new scheme. And lastly, the legendary armor of the Princess of the Sun had changed, encompassing vital areas while leaving the legs and underbelly bare. Flare stalked forward a few paces, fangs bared.</p><p class="indented double">\xe2\x80\x9cThat is far enough, monster.\xe2\x80\x9d The Valkyrie spoke firmly. Just for a moment, the slight wheezing was gone.</p><p class="indented double">The answer was a resounding cackle that seemed to rebound off the very air. \xe2\x80\x9cMe? A monster? Have you looked at yourself lately? If I am a monster, what does that make you, the vaunted \xe2\x80\x98defender of Equestria\xe2\x80\x99?\xe2\x80\x9d</p><p class="indented double">\xe2\x80\x9cIt makes me a better pony than you. I am willing to do what is necessary to preserve our species.\xe2\x80\x9d</p><p class="indented double">\xe2\x80\x9cWhich is why I tossed you about like a rag doll, I\xe2\x80\x99m sure. I\xe2\x80\x99m honestly surprised you yet live. I was positive I had killed you in that last battle. But no matter. I can just do it now, and have it over with.\xe2\x80\x9d Flare inched forward again, but paused when the ring of magic rent the air.</p><p class="indented double">\xe2\x80\x9cNo. You will no longer harm the ponies we swore to protect, Tia. I forbid it. You <i>will</i> answer for your crimes. You have harmed thousands. You slaughtered my closest friend, your own wife. And then you have the <i>audacity</i> to refuse to lower the sun, to turn our land into a barren nightmare.\xe2\x80\x9d Magic began to once more permeate the atmosphere as the Valkyrie prepared her spell. Princess Luna found herself taking several steps back; Despite the fact that the demented pony before them was her sister, right now this was not her fight any more.</p><p class="indented double">Corona\xe2\x80\x99s only response was to charge the other princess with a cry of rage, aiming to stop the spell from reaching completion. The armored pony stood her ground, setting her shoulder. Corona slammed into the alicorn, and was thrown back as still active wards flared to life. She came on again, horn lowered, intending to gore on the spot. The Valkyrie parried, lifting a hoof up casually to knock aside the deadly point. As Corona whirled once more, she finally spoke. \xe2\x80\x9cEvery thing I did\xe2\x80\xa6 was for Equestria!\xe2\x80\x9d And she came on again, thundering towards her opponent once more.</p><p class="indented double">The Valkyrie grabbed ahold of Corona\xe2\x80\x99s head in a vice grip and tossed the rampaging daymare over her shoulder. \xe2\x80\x9cYou failed Equestria! You forsake the promises we swore!\xe2\x80\x9d</p><p class="indented double">Corona fired a blast from her horn, catching the Valkyrie in the shoulder and causing the mare to stumble as her wards fizzled. The daymare pounced upon this opportunity, ramming a shod hoof against her foe\xe2\x80\x99s helmet. She then pressed her advantage, raining blow after blow onto the head. She punctuated each attack with words. \xe2\x80\x9cYou gave Magic to me! Me! And then you left me! Said you didn\xe2\x80\x99t want it, then left me with so much power! You forsook Equestria, and left me to pick up your pieces! If anything, you failed <i>me</i>!\xe2\x80\x9d </p><p class="indented double">Corona\xe2\x80\x99s horn flared, then proceeded to toss the Valkyrie away. She crashed through a building. \xe2\x80\x9cYou never had the strength of a true princess.\xe2\x80\x9d</p><p class="indented double">The other alicorn picked her way out of the ruined structure, limping. The wheezing was back, louder than before. \xe2\x80\x9cI do not rely on strength alone, Celestia. My power is all around you. Just begging to be used.\xe2\x80\x9d</p><p class="indented double">It was then that the daymare discovered her mistake. Throughout the entire fight, the Valkyrie\xe2\x80\x99s horn had never ceased its glow. Now it grew to blinding proportions, causing even Corona to falter. When the daymare went to take a step back, however, she discovered she was trapped inside a dome. Stone rose up around the traitor, crushing her in a grip she couldn\xe2\x80\x99t hope to escape. Her horn flashed dangerously, trying to dispell the magic. Nothing worked. Desperate to have the last word, she spoke in a sibilant hiss. \xe2\x80\x9cYou made me what I am.\xe2\x80\x9d</p><p class="indented double">The Valkyrie stared at her enemy coldly, before stepping into the sphere of magic. \xe2\x80\x9cNo. You chose your own destiny. As have I. Your sentence is hereby thus: You are banished into the deepest pits of the celestial body you control for a thousand years. You will stay there, and come to terms with all that you have done. And to ensure your sentence will be carried out, I hereby sacrifice my own mortal shell to chain you to your prison.\xe2\x80\x9d</p><p class="indented double">At these final words, a beam of light suddenly fell from the heavens, vaporizing everything inside the bubble. When the glow died, nothing remained save the Valkyrie\xe2\x80\x99s armor, and nothing could be heard aside from Luna\xe2\x80\x99s keening cry of anguish.</p><p class="double"><center>&lt;&lt;((*))&gt;&gt;</center>\t</p><p class="indented double"></p><p class="indented double">\xe2\x80\x9cCome on, Twilight. At least try to eat something. Tomorrow is an important day for all of us, and you can\xe2\x80\x99t pass out from hunger on such a big day!\xe2\x80\x9d Pinkie Pie, outrageously pink with the puffiest mane and tail imaginable, jabbed a hoof at Twilight Sparkle\xe2\x80\x99s thus far untouched plate. Twilight tried to return her smile, but found that her lips just couldn\xe2\x80\x99t form the simple movement. Twilight glanced down at the food set before her, picking at pieces of it with her magenta tinged magic. The plate was pile high with her favorite foods: Stacks of hayfries, a daisy sunflower sandwich, and several greens and fruits besides. Tonight, however, Twilight couldn\xe2\x80\x99t simply fall upon her food like she had in the past.</p><p class="indented double">Pinkie Pie\xe2\x80\x99s words rang true. Tomorrow would decide the future for Twilight Sparkle and the rest of the Canterlot Orphans. Tomorrow was Career Day, and would determine exactly what\xe2\x80\x94if any\xe2\x80\x94future Equestria had in store for her. Deep, deep down inside, the purple unicorn just <i>knew</i> she was being silly. From levitation to teleportation to complex spell casting, Twilight had studied them all and only wanted more. There was no way that Luna\xe2\x80\x99s School for Gifted Unicorns would turn her down. She would become a mage, one of the powerful defenders of Equestria, ready to serve the Crown in times of need. She was yanked from her daydreams by another voice.</p><p class="indented double">\xe2\x80\x9cAh think she\xe2\x80\x99s just nervous,\xe2\x80\x9d Applejack tossed down her fork and tipped her faithful Stetson forward, shading her emerald eyes a bit. Nothing made Applejack happier than to be outside in the heat of the Sun, tending apple trees and farming equipment. Twilight knew that Applejack was going to head directly into the Equestrian Rangers; an elite group of soldiers who farmed for a living, but acted as a defensive buffer to the Crown. With muscles like Applejack\xe2\x80\x99s, the mare would be suited for little else. \xe2\x80\x9cNerves are a dreadful thing, Twi. Don\xe2\x80\x99t let em distract ya.\xe2\x80\x9d</p><p class="indented double">\xe2\x80\x9cI\xe2\x80\x99m not nervous,\xe2\x80\x9d Twilight protested, twirling a fork in her magic. She realized as she did so that this was a mistake.</p><p class="indented double">Rainbow Dash glanced up from her own loaded plate, a comment already formed. \xe2\x80\x9cOf course Twilight is nervous! After all, who is going to want a unicorn mare that spends all of her time studying?\xe2\x80\x9d Sleek and smooth, Rainbow Dash was Wonderbolt material.</p><p class="indented double">\xe2\x80\x9cI\xe2\x80\x99m sure we&#039;re all nervous,\xe2\x80\x9d Fluttershy peeked her head out from behind her soft pink mane and offered a rare smile to Twilight, which the unicorn managed to return this time. Fluttershy lived up to her name, almost scared of her own shadow and too shy to make friends outside of her fellow Orphans. Her trusty first aid kit rested at the end of their table, within easy reach. As far as Twilight knew, Fluttershy never went anywhere without it.</p><p class="indented double">\xe2\x80\x9cWell, I\xe2\x80\x99m not!\xe2\x80\x9d Pinkie Pie proclaimed exuberantly. Twilight arched an eyebrow at her, which caused the bouncy mare to giggle. Pinkie Pie would almost certainly gravitate towards Equestria Intelligence. With a knack for baking or cooking, Pinkie already had the perfect alias to her name. Pinkie reached out an impossibly long hoof, almost as long as she was tall, and scooped up a doughnut from the platter of a passing waiter. She then proceeded to shove the entire thing into her mouth and swallow it whole.</p><p class="indented double">Twilight sighed slightly, struggling to take her mind off tomorrow, and tried to become more active with her fellow Canterlot Orphans.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Canterlot Orphans were just that: orphan fillies and colts whose parents had died in service to the Crown. Her Royal Highness Princess Luna raised these foals as Children of Canterlot, offering them a place to stay and giving them a small stipend from the Treasury. A vast majority of the Orphans were taken in by other Canterlot nobles\xe2\x80\x94with the recent exception being Twilight Sparkle. As young as she was, the aspiring mage knew exactly why, too: Freifrau Twilena Star Sparkle av Twinkle was one of the last living descendants of one of the most important and influential Houses. As such, other nobility only saw her as a marriage contract that would allow them to gain more peerage. After turning her third foster family into a trio of toads, Princess Luna herself deigned to give Twilena living space within Canterlot. Twilight mentally shuddered. She hated her real name, much preferring the informal Twilight Sparkle.</p><p class="indented double">Despite her attempt to ward off thoughts of her slight predicament, Twilight\xe2\x80\x99s mind stubbornly refused to let it go. It was hard, being one of the last lines of one of the only Houses devoted purely to the Crown. It was even harder because she was a mare. Among other nobility in Canterlot, it was expected that Twilight Sparkle marry into some other House and raise foals. That should be her sole purpose, and nothing more. Twilight, however, had other plans. Being officially recognized by the Crown as a Canterlot Orphan, Twilight could participate in Career Day if she so chose. Once she turned seventeen, Twilight had a decision to make: She could both fold to the wishes of other nobility and find some stuffy old snob to marry, or she could find her own place in the world.&nbsp;&nbsp;It was Twilight\xe2\x80\x99s every intention to do the latter. Career Day would provide that opportunity. When tomorrow comes, so too will the Masters of various branches of Equestria services. Should a Master Mage decide to accept Twilight Sparkle as an apprentice, she\xe2\x80\x99ll be able to fully leave the plotting of other nobles behind. It would be tough going for a while, but doable. She\xe2\x80\x99ll have at least two years of learning at Luna\xe2\x80\x99s School for Gifted Unicorns, then another two years of study under her Master. After that, if her Master deems her competent enough, she\xe2\x80\x99ll be out on her own, patrolling Equestria\xe2\x80\x99s borders and keeping an eye on their enemies.</p><p class="indented double">Twilight stood up from her still untouched plate suddenly. Ignoring the questions of the other Orphans, Twilight exited the palace kitchens and meandered down a random hallway. She knew her friends were only trying to help comfort her (maybe with the exception of Rainbow), but at the moment Twilight did not want their condolences. Maybe Rainbow was right after all, as loath as Twilight wanted to admit it. The reclusive unicorn spent so much of her time locked away studying, it was a wonder any Master would even look twice at her. She could barely even classify her fellow Orphans as actual friends. The general defense against the schemes attempted to be woven around her was to usually lock herself away with her books. Doing so also helped hide the fact that she was still a Blank Flank.</p><p class="indented double">The thought of still not having her cutie mark caused Twilight to glance longingly back at her bare flanks. Canterlot Orphans almost never received their cutie marks until after Career Day, meaning they were usually the oldest ponies to never have one. As such, this lead to a lot of ridicule from much younger colts and fillies who already knew what they were going to do with their life. So yes, locking herself away in her own personal tower with her books was often a good idea. At least the books would not laugh at her. Twilight scowled slightly, kicking at the marble floor with a forehoof. She did not want to go back and attempt to eat, or to be surrounded by her Orphan-mates. Even her books did not beckon to her like they normally did. Unable to decide what to do now or even what she wanted to do, Twilight headed for the one place she could always find peace and quiet.</p><p class="indented double">The Royal Gardens were like a second home to Twilight, coming only after her books and the library. The gardens were so vast, Twilight had several places she could go for total solitude, away from other ponies. Twilight\xe2\x80\x99s hooves rang out on cobblestone as she stepped through the archway leading into the main lobby of the palace. The two pegasus guards stationed at either side nodded respectfully at the Orphan as she walked sedately past, heading directly to the Gardens off to one side. As Twilight passed the boundary into the Gardens proper, she let out a heartfelt sigh of relief. Her tense form relaxed, and her breathing came easier. It was always like this in the Gardens. The smell of various plants. The soothing shade of towering trees, blotting out the moonlight. The soft symphony of insects providing a pleasant background noise. Even the occasional wild rabbit or bird helped create a potent mix that struck a calming chord deep within Twilight. She often came here when plagued by thoughts of the past and future, and every time this magical place put her at ease.</p><p class="indented double">Twilight immediately took a right, headed off to an obscure corner of the garden. Right now, she only sought peace and quiet. She did not want to think, or to make small talk, or anything. She just wanted to sit and do absolutely nothing but breathe in the crisp atmosphere around her. Twilight trotted right up to a small stone bench overshadowed by towering oaks. A slight outline that was whiter than the rest of the stone, matching her body when curled up, was a testament to how often the young unicorn came to this very bench. She clambered up onto the coolness and curled up, matching the indentation perfectly. She closed her eyes and just lay there, still as the rock she rested on. She barely even moved as she breathed. Even if somepony walked right by her, they would only see her if she moved or they tried to sit on her.</p><p class="indented double">As Twilight lay there, in a state halfway between sleep and awareness, the lights in Canterlot Palace started to extinguish. One by one the many windows in the palace went out. Twilight\xe2\x80\x99s ear flicked as she heard Pinkie Pie calling her name in the distance, but Twilight ignored the call. Eventually, there was only one light left shining in the palace, high above her. She could see it with her magical sight, and knew that it belonged to Princess Luna, ruler of Equestria. Undoubtedly the Monarch was still awake, poring over papers and other important documents. The Princess often stayed up late, taking care of business so that she could continue to run Equestria as smoothly as possible.</p><p class="indented double">Soon, however, even the light in Princess Luna\xe2\x80\x99s chamber went out as the Royal prepared for some sleep before reawakening to brighten the moon, signalling the start of a new night. Still, Twilight Sparkle remained on her bench, uncaring and unthinking. Slowly but surely, the gifted unicorn began to expand her consciousness outward. When she had first began training herself in turning her mind into a corporeal form, Twilight had barely managed to expand a few feet from her body. Practicing again and again allowed the purple mare to expand a little farther each time. Now, she could extend her consciousness well past the garden boundaries, and drape it across all of Canterlot Palace. She could feel almost everything like this. The bright pinpricks of her fellow Orphans were the easiest to pick out, as she spent a good deal of her time with them, whenever she was not studying. Each were currently in their rooms, wrapped in easy slumber. Twilight\xe2\x80\x99s lips curved into a smile as she gently caressed each of them in turn. Despite what she told herself, Twilight had really come to care for the other Orphans... Even Rainbow Dash, as brash and cocky as she was.</p><p class="indented double">Next, Twilight sought out the familiar spark that was her brother. Captain Shining Armor was an orphan too, but not recognized as such by the Crown any more. He joined the Guard on his Career day, and has since risen up through the ranks of the Canterlot Guard with unmatched determination and devotion. Thanks to Shining\xe2\x80\x99s own ceaseless duties and Twilight\xe2\x80\x99s studying, the siblings have not had much time to visit each other often. Twilight missed her brother dearly. He was the only family she had left, and fully supported his younger sister in her quest to be an independent mare. On several occasions Shining had personally offered to step in and take care of a particularly nasty noble. However, thanks to Twilight\xe2\x80\x99s reclusiveness to ponies who were not fellow Orphans, Shining never really had to do much more than flex his military muscles.</p><p class="indented double">With a small sigh of exertion, Twilight finally returned to her body. She clambered to her hooves, wincing at the slight cramps from remaining still for so long. In roughly seven hours she would be standing before the Masters, who would determine her future. Quickly and quietly, Twilight fled back to her tower, still struggling to keep her mind off the future and what it would hold. The young mare collapsed upon her bed with a grunt, where sleep finally took a hold of her tired mind.</p><p class="double"></b></u></i></span></center></blockquote></p>\t</body>\n</html>', 'version': 1, 'parent_story_id': 104188}, 'chapter_id': 320259, 'cursor': <mysql.connector.cursor.MySQLCursor object at 0x02E01BB0>, 'connection': <mysql.connector.connection.MySQLConnection object at 0x02E01A70>, 'html': '<html>\n\t<head>\n\t\t<head><meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=UTF-8"/></head>\n\t</head>\n\t<body>\n\t\t<h1><a href="http://www.fimfiction.net/story/104188/valkyrie">Valkyrie</a></h1>\n\t\t<h2>by <a href="http://www.fimfiction.net/user/Flicka+Ravenhide">Flicka Ravenhide</a></h2>\n\n\t\t<hr />\n\n\t\t<a name=\'1\'></a><h3>Chapter 1 (*)</h3>\n<p class=\'indented\'>The world was a battlefield.</p><p class="indented double">There was no contesting that simple fact, and nothing else could even come close to describing the raw destruction. Long gouges had been dug into the earth, a testament to massive weapons of war and their awe inducing power. Trees had been stripped completely bare of everything save their bark, a result of chaotic magical energies that yet still swirled in the air. Pockets of flame guttered here and there, feeding off of long charred grass and other foliage. Remnants of buildings dotted the landscape spasmodically, some flickering with flames, others reduced to naught but rubble. The sky was a sickly color, an unholy orange combination that was the result of the sun and the moon sharing the sky at the same time; neither refused to lower for the other. The cold twinkling of stars could also be seen in the acidic atmosphere, silent observers to the massive struggles that had occurred below.</p><p class="indented double">And among it all, Princess Luna yet stood proud, unwavering. Her foe, consumed by madness and hatred, had proven more resilient than originally anticipated. She had hoped, before all of this had began, that she would have been able to end this chaos before it spread to her ponies. Naturally, that never happened, and the end result was the war torn nation around her. Ponies on both sides had fought and died, father and son, mother and daughter. On one side, those still completely loyal to her and the true Equestrian Crown. On the other side, those loyal to the usurper\xe2\x80\xa6 Corona Flare. Both had paid the cost of war twice over, and at this point in time Luna would be thankful for this to end any time within the next several years.</p><p class="indented double">The beating of tired wings behind her heralded the arrival of another pony to the scene. Princess Luna knew, before she even turned around, who the mare was. No other pony felt like this one did, and as Luna glanced to her right her instincts were confirmed. Her Valkyrie and a fellow ruler had once more made it to her side, and as Luna turned to the other mare she felt her heart clench. How the other pony was still standing was a mystery to the dark princess. The once proud armor was badly damaged, restricting movement and breathing, if the harsh whistling was anything to go by. The front lower chest of it was crushed inward, and there were perforations along the rest of the suit that trailed dried blood. Above the caved in section, the torc built into the armor still gleamed with bright power. The other princess\xe2\x80\x99 weapon had long since been lost in the desperate struggle, undoubtedly for good. For long moments both princesses stood there, one armored from head to hoof, the other protected by the lightest armor she could forge and a few wards. Finally, Luna spoke.</p><p class="indented double">\xe2\x80\x9cYou look pretty bad, Valkyrie. You should have a medic look at you, just in case.\xe2\x80\x9d</p><p class="indented double">The Valkyrie shook her head gently. \xe2\x80\x9cNay. My alicorn magic has already healed the worst of the wounds, and it would take a blacksmith of considerable skill to pry this blasted armor off of me. We simply do not have the time.\xe2\x80\x9d</p><p class="indented double">Luna faced south again. \xe2\x80\x9cWe do not. Are you sure this plan of yours will work?\xe2\x80\x9d</p><p class="indented double">\xe2\x80\x9cIt\xe2\x80\x99ll work. I\xe2\x80\x99ve always been more powerful than she, despite her recent connection. She won\xe2\x80\x99t even be able to break the spell when I begin its casting. Once it is complete, she\xe2\x80\x99ll be gone. And you\xe2\x80\x99ll be able to rebuild our beloved country.\xe2\x80\x9d</p><p class="indented double">\xe2\x80\x9cBut what about <i>you</i>? How am I supposed to rebuild as the sole ruler of Equestria?&nbsp;&nbsp;I need you, need you here to help me. You can\xe2\x80\x99t leave me here alone!\xe2\x80\x9d Princess Luna\xe2\x80\x99s voice took on a despairing note.</p><p class="indented double">The other princess nuzzled up beneath Luna\xe2\x80\x99s chin, giving the mare a quick kiss. \xe2\x80\x9cI can and I will, Luna. It\xe2\x80\x99s the only way to stop her. It may not seem like much, but I can give you time to rebuild. Time to gather your strength for her eventual return, for not even my power can hold her for eternity. And I doubt I\xe2\x80\x99ll be gone forever, you know. That\xe2\x80\x99s not how Harmony works. The world needs its defenders, and I\xe2\x80\x99m one of them. I\xe2\x80\x99ll return eventually, I\xe2\x80\x99m sure of it.\xe2\x80\x9d</p><p class="indented double">\xe2\x80\x9cI still don\xe2\x80\x99t want you to go.\xe2\x80\x9d Luna pouted.</p><p class="indented double">The Valkyrie was about to reply before she was interrupted by more wingbeats. There was a blinding flare of light, and then there she was. Corona Flare. The same maniacal pony they\xe2\x80\x99ve been fighting for the past who knew how long. The pony they had once viewed as a friend, as an equal. Even gazing upon her now, neither princess could detect a trace of Celestia within the hellish creature opposite them. The once pristine white coat was now blood scarlet, as though it had been reforged in the deepest depths of the sun. The magnificent pastel mane resembled flames from the pits of Tartarus, blinding orange and yellow and burning anything it neared. Oddly enough, the traitor\xe2\x80\x99s cutie mark never changed, merely had its colors inverted to fit the new scheme. And lastly, the legendary armor of the Princess of the Sun had changed, encompassing vital areas while leaving the legs and underbelly bare. Flare stalked forward a few paces, fangs bared.</p><p class="indented double">\xe2\x80\x9cThat is far enough, monster.\xe2\x80\x9d The Valkyrie spoke firmly. Just for a moment, the slight wheezing was gone.</p><p class="indented double">The answer was a resounding cackle that seemed to rebound off the very air. \xe2\x80\x9cMe? A monster? Have you looked at yourself lately? If I am a monster, what does that make you, the vaunted \xe2\x80\x98defender of Equestria\xe2\x80\x99?\xe2\x80\x9d</p><p class="indented double">\xe2\x80\x9cIt makes me a better pony than you. I am willing to do what is necessary to preserve our species.\xe2\x80\x9d</p><p class="indented double">\xe2\x80\x9cWhich is why I tossed you about like a rag doll, I\xe2\x80\x99m sure. I\xe2\x80\x99m honestly surprised you yet live. I was positive I had killed you in that last battle. But no matter. I can just do it now, and have it over with.\xe2\x80\x9d Flare inched forward again, but paused when the ring of magic rent the air.</p><p class="indented double">\xe2\x80\x9cNo. You will no longer harm the ponies we swore to protect, Tia. I forbid it. You <i>will</i> answer for your crimes. You have harmed thousands. You slaughtered my closest friend, your own wife. And then you have the <i>audacity</i> to refuse to lower the sun, to turn our land into a barren nightmare.\xe2\x80\x9d Magic began to once more permeate the atmosphere as the Valkyrie prepared her spell. Princess Luna found herself taking several steps back; Despite the fact that the demented pony before them was her sister, right now this was not her fight any more.</p><p class="indented double">Corona\xe2\x80\x99s only response was to charge the other princess with a cry of rage, aiming to stop the spell from reaching completion. The armored pony stood her ground, setting her shoulder. Corona slammed into the alicorn, and was thrown back as still active wards flared to life. She came on again, horn lowered, intending to gore on the spot. The Valkyrie parried, lifting a hoof up casually to knock aside the deadly point. As Corona whirled once more, she finally spoke. \xe2\x80\x9cEvery thing I did\xe2\x80\xa6 was for Equestria!\xe2\x80\x9d And she came on again, thundering towards her opponent once more.</p><p class="indented double">The Valkyrie grabbed ahold of Corona\xe2\x80\x99s head in a vice grip and tossed the rampaging daymare over her shoulder. \xe2\x80\x9cYou failed Equestria! You forsake the promises we swore!\xe2\x80\x9d</p><p class="indented double">Corona fired a blast from her horn, catching the Valkyrie in the shoulder and causing the mare to stumble as her wards fizzled. The daymare pounced upon this opportunity, ramming a shod hoof against her foe\xe2\x80\x99s helmet. She then pressed her advantage, raining blow after blow onto the head. She punctuated each attack with words. \xe2\x80\x9cYou gave Magic to me! Me! And then you left me! Said you didn\xe2\x80\x99t want it, then left me with so much power! You forsook Equestria, and left me to pick up your pieces! If anything, you failed <i>me</i>!\xe2\x80\x9d </p><p class="indented double">Corona\xe2\x80\x99s horn flared, then proceeded to toss the Valkyrie away. She crashed through a building. \xe2\x80\x9cYou never had the strength of a true princess.\xe2\x80\x9d</p><p class="indented double">The other alicorn picked her way out of the ruined structure, limping. The wheezing was back, louder than before. \xe2\x80\x9cI do not rely on strength alone, Celestia. My power is all around you. Just begging to be used.\xe2\x80\x9d</p><p class="indented double">It was then that the daymare discovered her mistake. Throughout the entire fight, the Valkyrie\xe2\x80\x99s horn had never ceased its glow. Now it grew to blinding proportions, causing even Corona to falter. When the daymare went to take a step back, however, she discovered she was trapped inside a dome. Stone rose up around the traitor, crushing her in a grip she couldn\xe2\x80\x99t hope to escape. Her horn flashed dangerously, trying to dispell the magic. Nothing worked. Desperate to have the last word, she spoke in a sibilant hiss. \xe2\x80\x9cYou made me what I am.\xe2\x80\x9d</p><p class="indented double">The Valkyrie stared at her enemy coldly, before stepping into the sphere of magic. \xe2\x80\x9cNo. You chose your own destiny. As have I. Your sentence is hereby thus: You are banished into the deepest pits of the celestial body you control for a thousand years. You will stay there, and come to terms with all that you have done. And to ensure your sentence will be carried out, I hereby sacrifice my own mortal shell to chain you to your prison.\xe2\x80\x9d</p><p class="indented double">At these final words, a beam of light suddenly fell from the heavens, vaporizing everything inside the bubble. When the glow died, nothing remained save the Valkyrie\xe2\x80\x99s armor, and nothing could be heard aside from Luna\xe2\x80\x99s keening cry of anguish.</p><p class="double"><center>&lt;&lt;((*))&gt;&gt;</center>\t</p><p class="indented double"></p><p class="indented double">\xe2\x80\x9cCome on, Twilight. At least try to eat something. Tomorrow is an important day for all of us, and you can\xe2\x80\x99t pass out from hunger on such a big day!\xe2\x80\x9d Pinkie Pie, outrageously pink with the puffiest mane and tail imaginable, jabbed a hoof at Twilight Sparkle\xe2\x80\x99s thus far untouched plate. Twilight tried to return her smile, but found that her lips just couldn\xe2\x80\x99t form the simple movement. Twilight glanced down at the food set before her, picking at pieces of it with her magenta tinged magic. The plate was pile high with her favorite foods: Stacks of hayfries, a daisy sunflower sandwich, and several greens and fruits besides. Tonight, however, Twilight couldn\xe2\x80\x99t simply fall upon her food like she had in the past.</p><p class="indented double">Pinkie Pie\xe2\x80\x99s words rang true. Tomorrow would decide the future for Twilight Sparkle and the rest of the Canterlot Orphans. Tomorrow was Career Day, and would determine exactly what\xe2\x80\x94if any\xe2\x80\x94future Equestria had in store for her. Deep, deep down inside, the purple unicorn just <i>knew</i> she was being silly. From levitation to teleportation to complex spell casting, Twilight had studied them all and only wanted more. There was no way that Luna\xe2\x80\x99s School for Gifted Unicorns would turn her down. She would become a mage, one of the powerful defenders of Equestria, ready to serve the Crown in times of need.
