The unicorn rifled through the pages until she found the pages marked by a magical bookmark and began to read.\r\n\r\nEquestria\xe2\x80\x99s Military Forces.\r\n\r\n\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0 Equestrian Rangers \xe2\x80\x93The Rangers very rarely fight off of Equestria\xe2\x80\x99s soil. This branch of the military acts as a \xe2\x80\x9cnational guard\xe2\x80\x9d of sorts, mobilizing in the event Equestria becomes invaded. In times of relative peace, the Rangers comprise about sixty percent of Equestria\xe2\x80\x99s food sources, farming land in addition to performing regular military exercises. If Equestria is ever besieged, only forty percent of the Ranger\xe2\x80\x99s full might are ever engaged at one time, allowing the nation to continue to produce enough food to withstand an invasion that may last years.\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0That was certainly interesting. Twilight had known that Equestrian Rangers were designed to protect the Crown, but she had no idea that their deployment was so intricate. With a good portion of the Rangers still helping produce food, Equestria would prove to be a difficult nation to take by direct force. Twilight read on.\r\n\r\n\r\n\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0 The Wonderbolts \xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x9cFaster, Swifter, Stronger\xe2\x80\x9d is the motto of the Wonderbolts, and it is a motto they strive to uphold each and every night. The Bolts are hands down the best aerial force Sol has ever seen, the first deployed to an engagement and the last to leave. Ancient pegasi magic combined with aerial moves introduced by the iconic Commander Hurricane has given the Bolts a reputation well deserved. Undying loyalty to the Crown they serve and to each other leaves the Wonderbolts as Equestria\xe2\x80\x99s oldest military force.\r\n\r\n\r\n\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0So that was what Rainbow Dash was getting herself into. It sounded like the Wonderbolts strived to be the very best, all the time. It seemed rather unrealistic to Twilight, and the studious mare wondered if Dash would be up to the challenge.\r\n\r\n\r\n\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0 Medic Corps \xe2\x80\x93The Medic Corps have been around as long as the Wonderbolts. Comprised of animal Whisperers and the best doctors Equestria can provide, the Corps is the singular force that keeps Equestria breathing. From combating sickness in Equestria\xe2\x80\x99s many cities and towns, to practicing their art upon the field of battle, the Corps provide the muscle behind recovery.\r\n\r\n\r\n\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0Well, that certainly sounded right up Fluttershy\xe2\x80\x99s alley, if she could get over her intense shyness. Twilight didn\xe2\x80\x99t know any other pony that would care so much for a complete stranger.\r\n\r\n\t Canterlot Guard --The Canterlot Guard is one of the last lines of defense for the Equestrian Crown. They mainly police the palace and the grounds itself, although it has been known for Canterlot Guards to sign contracts with other nobility.\r\n\t\r\n\r\n\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0That was what Shining Armor was, a Canterlot Guard. Nothing made her brother happier than to be defending the Princess.\r\n\r\n\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\r\n\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0 Equestrian Intelligence  \xe2\x80\x93EI knows everything. A vast spy network comprised of undercover agents everywhere, Equestrian Intelligence ensures the nation they serve is prepared for anything. Every major plan, every notable event usually revolves around an EI combat agent. They operate from the shadows, usually shaping Equestria\xe2\x80\x99s future more than any other military force.\r\n\r\n\r\n\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0Equestrian Intelligence had Pinkie Pie written all over it. That pony knew things about other ponies she had no business knowing about. It didn\xe2\x80\x99t matter if it was a thought never spoken aloud. Pinkie Pie would still know about it.\r\n\r\n\r\n\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0 Arcane Brigade \xe2\x80\x93If there is one thing the enemies of Equestria fear, it is Princess Luna\xe2\x80\x99s Arcane Brigade. Comprised of the most deadly spell casters ever born, the Brigade only enters a conflict when the need is dire. The Brigade guards their magical secrets jealously, ensuring that enemies know next to nothing about them. The Brigade is also responsible for Equestria\xe2\x80\x99s advancements with magic.\r\n\r\n\r\n\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0The Arcane Brigade. The name sent pleasing shivers down Twilight\xe2\x80\x99s spine. She had always dreamed that she would have a chance to join the Brigade, after learning all she could from a Master Mage. The Brigade solved everything, and Twilight would love nothing more than to be that part of Equestria\xe2\x80\x99s forces. Perhaps Luna would allow her to join the Brigade after Twilight completed her training.\r\n\r\n\r\n\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0 The Valkyrie \xe2\x80\x93If the Arcane Brigade brings fear to Equestria\xe2\x80\x99s enemies, then Princess Luna\xe2\x80\x99s Valkyrie brings unbridled terror. Throughout Equestria\xe2\x80\x99s history, the Valkyrie has been a mare every bit as powerful as Princess Luna herself. Records show that victory is guaranteed when the Valkyrie takes to the battlefield. Mastering every branch of magic known to Sol, the Valkyrie is Princess Luna\xe2\x80\x99s right hoof, meting out justice where she sees fit. The other branches of military also directly answer to the Valkyrie, rather than Princess Luna. \r\n\r\n\r\n\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0This  was a name that brought back foalhood memories. Everypony knew who the Valkyrie had been. Respected, feared, and loved as much as the Princess herself, the last Valkyrie vanished sometime during the giant War almost a thousand years ago. To the best of Twilight\xe2\x80\x99s knowledge, there has not been one since.\r\n\r\n\r\n\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0 Princess Luna  \xe2\x80\x93There has only been one instance where the Princess of Equestria has entered combat personally. This was back during the War of the Sun and Moon decades ago, when the usurper Corona Flare attempted to claim the throne of Equestria. The details of this war are vague at best, but it is a testament of Princess Luna\xe2\x80\x99s prowess that Corona Flare is no more.\r\n\r\n\r\n\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0Twilight remembered reading vague details about this war. All anypony remembered was that Corona Flare attempted to usurp Princess Luna\xe2\x80\x99s position, to bring about never-ending day. After a vicious war, Princess Luna emerged victorious, and supposedly banished Flare into the Sun. At the time, Twilight had thought the tale was simply something to entertain young foals. After seeing Princess Luna up close, and feeling  her majestic power, Twilight was starting to think that perhaps there was a grain of truth to this story. With a thoughtful expression, Twilight opened the second text.\r\n\r\n\r\n\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0Magical Basics\r\n\r\n\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0Magic is a part of everything. From the visible and flashy magic of unicorns and other casters, to the more subtle passive magic of ground and fliers, magic is everywhere. Over the years, magic has branched out into ten different categories, each with their own counterpart. They are as follows:\r\n\r\n\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\r\n\r\n\r\n\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0There have been numerous disputes when categorizing magic as we know it. For example, a good many scholars and mages feel that Light and Night should be their own counterparts and that a new Accord Magic should be created for Destruction. However, this idea is not entirely sound and has been thus far ignored; Light magic focuses on strength, courage, and  creating new things, while Destruction does the exact opposite.\r\n\r\n\r\n\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0Twilight knew all of this already. But Princess Luna undoubtedly had some reason to bring this to the forefront of the unicorn\xe2\x80\x99s mind. Twilight was interrupted from her thoughts by the reappearance of Luna, who had a strange gleam in her eye.\r\n\r\n\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xe2\x80\x9cGood, you are finished reading! Now, let us set you up with some chores.\xe2\x80\x9d\r\n\r\n\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xe2\x80\x9cChores?\xe2\x80\x9d Twilight echoed, confused. This was not what she had expected when Luna had said there she was going to teach Twilight magic.\r\n\r\n\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xe2\x80\x9cYes, chores. Take a look around, Twilight. Are there any servants here?\xe2\x80\x9d\r\n\r\n\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xe2\x80\x9cNo, Princess.\xe2\x80\x9d Twilight was confusion layered her voice, but she did have a small inkling of where this was going.\r\n\r\n\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xe2\x80\x9cOf course there is not! Servants rarely ever approach my study and its hallway; it is the one place they are forbidden from!\xe2\x80\x9d\r\n\r\n\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0This made sense. Twilight had noticed a distinct lack of servants on her walk here, despite the haze over her mind at the time. \xe2\x80\x9cSo then I am going to perform the cleaning they are unable to do?\xe2\x80\x9d Try as she might, Twilight could not hide the disappointment coloring her words.\r\n\r\n\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0Luna finally had mercy on her student. \xe2\x80\x9cRelax, Twilight. You are not in trouble. This is my way of gauging your magical aptitude. I don\xe2\x80\x99t want you to do anything overly fancy to accomplish what I ask of you. All you should need to do is some levitation and a few other minor spells. I want to test your control and see how you go about completing everynight tasks. Firstly, I would like you to clean up after our lunch. After that, the fireplace needs cleaning out and the mantle dusted. The rugs need to be dirt free. Then you can start on my bookshelves. Dust them and clean them. Make sure my books are all categorized. Once you are finished, then I can get a better idea of where to start you in your training.\xe2\x80\x9d\r\n\r\n\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0Twilight perked up a bit. Housework was nothing new to her, despite being of noble birth; growing up in the palace instead of a foster home meant she had to clean her own room on numerous occasions. The fact that the Princess wanted Twilight use magic made the work more bearable. Humming a faint tune, Twilight got started. Horn shimmering with a low key magenta glow, she attacked the stuff left over from lunch. A single horn wave removed leftover foodstuffs from utensils and surfaces, and then a further wave sent the implements sailing back to their proper place in the kitchenette. At the same time the purple unicorn attacked the fireplace, Vanishing the ash left over from its last use and whitening the bricks a bit. She then produced a small duster and proceeded to buff the mantle. By that time she had finished the lunch mess and moved onto the books and bookshelves.\r\n\r\n\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0Princess Luna watched her student with interest. She was using and maintaining spells constantly, without conscious effort. Twilight\xe2\x80\x99s horn didn\xe2\x80\x99t even shine any brighter than it had at first, signaling a record low power usage despite all the magic the unicorn was using. It was starting to look like taking Twilight as her personal prot\xc3\xa9g\xc3\xa9 was a very good decision. As Luna watched her student, her eyes started to wander. Twilight was young, certainly, but no less an appealing mare. Her legs were sturdy and strong, a testimony to an active pony despite Twilight\xe2\x80\x99s love for books. The fact that Twilight was not some fat, lazy scholar was a very good thing, in Luna\xe2\x80\x99s book. While Twilight was nowhere near as glossy and graceful as Luna, there was a certain symphony about her movements, as the unicorn turned slightly to keep an eye on her spells. And besides, gracefulness would come in time. All in all, she was confident that she had chosen well. Twilight would make a good Valkyrie.\r\n\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\r\n\r\n\r\n', 'chapter_number': 3, 'parent_chapter_id': 323064, 'chapter_html': '<html>\n\t<head>\n\t\t<head><meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=UTF-8"/></head>\n\t</head>\n\t<body>\n\t\t<h1><a href="http://www.fimfiction.net/story/104188/valkyrie">Valkyrie</a></h1>\n\t\t<h2>by <a href="http://www.fimfiction.net/user/Flicka+Ravenhide">Flicka Ravenhide</a></h2>\n\n\t\t<hr />\n\n\t\t<a name=\'3\'></a><h3>Chapter 3</h3>\n<p class=\'indented\'>Twilight watched in slight fascination as Luna went about the task of preparing a simple meal. At first, Twilight had wanted to question why on Equestria Princess Luna had a small kitchenette in her <i>study</i> of all places. Then Twilight reminded herself that Luna was a Princess, and therefore could have a kitchen anywhere she chose to. After that, Twilight became distracted just watching Luna. The Alicorn moved about the appliances with gentle grace, never once hurrying as she chopped some greens for a simple salad and sliced some fresh turkey meat for sandwiches. The latter was what Twilight was really looking forward to; Meat was quite rare in Equestria, as they could never grow it fast enough to feed an entire nation. Meat was usually reserved for special occasions like Hearth\xe2\x80\x99s Warming Eve, and the rest of the time the ponies of Equestria made due with enhanced fruits and vegetables.</p><p class="double">\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0It took Twilight a few moments to realize that she was no longer just watching the Princess work. Time and again Twilight\xe2\x80\x99s eyes were drawn to Luna\xe2\x80\x99s seemingly natural beauty. Princess Luna was only a stretch or two taller than Twilight, but the Princess still had legs that gave the impression of being miles long. Luna\xe2\x80\x99s backside was so smooth, rippling and coiling as the ruler of Equestria moved about. And her wings! They fanned the air gently every now and then as Luna stirred and mixed, full of downy tenderness and strong energy. \xc2\xa0Twilight felt her cheeks heat furiously and quickly averted her eyes, scolding herself for ogling the Princess so! Thankfully, by the time Princess Luna turned bearing a tray of food in her obsidian magic, Twilight had managed to wrest her blush under control. And her wandering eyes.</p><p class="double">\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0Luna plunked down a turkey and sunflower sandwich in front of her new student and set the salad aside for the moment. She gestured to the food. \xe2\x80\x9cEat, Twilight. I find it easier to learn new things on a full stomach.\xe2\x80\x9d</p><p class="double">\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0Hesitating slightly (she was still in the presence of <i>the</i> Princess!) Twilight took a nibble from her sandwich. She immediately began eating with gusto, moaning slightly. It had been far too long since she had been able to have any meat at all. Princess Luna grinned, clearly pleased.</p><p class="double">\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0Twilight swallowed. \xe2\x80\x9cSo, Princess\xe2\x80\x94\xe2\x80\x9d</p><p class="double">\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xe2\x80\x9cLuna,\xe2\x80\x9d came the swift correction, and Twilight smiled slightly.</p><p>\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0</p><p>\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xe2\x80\x9cLuna,\xe2\x80\x9d Twilight tried again. \xe2\x80\x9cWhy exactly are you going to teach me about all ten branches of magic?\xe2\x80\x9d</p><p class="double">\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0Princess Luna actually arched an eyebrow. \xe2\x80\x9cDo you not wish to learn more about magic?\xe2\x80\x9d</p><p class="double">\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0Twilight was quick to assure her mentor. \xe2\x80\x9cOf course I do, Princess. But no other mage would accept an apprentice who wanted to study a branch of magic outside what they taught.\xe2\x80\x9d</p><p class="double">\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0Princess Luna frowned briefly at the renewed use of her title before she spoke. \xe2\x80\x9cI am also no mere mage, Twilight Sparkle. You have not escaped my notice, living in the palace. I\xe2\x80\x99ve seen you diving into your studies, determined to learn everything you could about magic in general. Most other students are simply content to follow one path. Even from an early age, however, you were seeking knowledge on as many branches of magic as you could. Some magic, you discovered, are not exactly talked about in any depth in any of the books you\xe2\x80\x99ve studied. Friendship and Animosity are examples of this, as those two do not always manifest in the clearest ways possible. Others, like Necromancy, are not talked about at all, merely glossed over with a hurried explanation. Yet no matter what you managed to read, no book at the Canterlot Archives actually taught you the proper techniques for magic, did they?\xe2\x80\x9d</p><p class="double">\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0Twilight took another bite of her sandwich before answering. \xe2\x80\x9cNo. What little I do know about magic I taught myself. It was enough that I could impress any Master I wanted. But that plan didn\xe2\x80\x99t go over well. I didn\xe2\x80\x99t see a single mage at the time of my Choosing.\xe2\x80\x9d</p><p class="double">\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xe2\x80\x9cBecause I warned them to stay away, Twilight,\xe2\x80\x9d Luna spoke gently. \xe2\x80\x9cI told them, under no circumstances, were any Mage to appear at your Choosing. I had chosen you to be my next prot\xc3\xa9g\xc3\xa9e long before any of those fools had their eyes on you.\xe2\x80\x9d</p><p class="double">\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0Twilight looked up at this revelation, eyes wide. \xe2\x80\x9cBut why, Princess? I am naught but a curious unicorn filly who loves to read. What if I don\xe2\x80\x99t live up to your expectations?\xe2\x80\x9d</p><p class="double">\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0Princess Luna chuckled a tiny bit, finally understanding what was eating away at her new student. \xe2\x80\x9cI chose you because I can see your potential, Twilight Sparkle. And I shall leave it at that. But know this: If you do not live up to my expectations, then I will keep trying until you get it right. I know you will always put forth your best effort, but not every pony can just automatically be good at everything. I want to help guide you upon your journey, and I cannot do that if I abandon you over a small mistake. Now, come. I see that you have finished your lunch, as have I. I\xe2\x80\x99ve got some books I\xe2\x80\x99d like you to read a few passages from. After that, I believe I can find some other stuff for you to work on.\xe2\x80\x9d</p><p class="double">\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0Luna stood up, clearing the small table with a pulse from her horn. In the same pulse, she levitated two thick tomes over to Twilight. Tilting her head sideways, Twilight read the titles: <i>Military Equestria</i> and <i>Basic Guide to Magic</i>.</p><p class="double">\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xe2\x80\x9cThese two books will become your primary sources of information for the time being. A good deal of your initial studies will revolve around these two. I\xe2\x80\x99ve already marked the pages I would like you to read from. Start with <i>Military Equestria</i> and go from there. I must take care of a small bit of business, and then I will return.\xe2\x80\x9d</p><p class="double">\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0With that, Princess Luna was gone. Frowning a bit at her teacher\xe2\x80\x99s sudden disappearance, Twilight cracked open the first book she had been told to read. The unicorn rifled through the pages until she found the pages marked by a magical bookmark and began to read.</p><p class="double"><center><u><b>Equestria\xe2\x80\x99s Military Forces.</b></u></center></p><p class="double">\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0<center><i><b> Equestrian Rangers</b> \xe2\x80\x93The Rangers very rarely fight off of Equestria\xe2\x80\x99s soil. This branch of the military acts as a \xe2\x80\x9cnational guard\xe2\x80\x9d of sorts, mobilizing in the event Equestria becomes invaded. In times of relative peace, the Rangers comprise about sixty percent of Equestria\xe2\x80\x99s food sources, farming land in addition to performing regular military exercises. If Equestria is ever besieged, only forty percent of the Ranger\xe2\x80\x99s full might are ever engaged at one time, allowing the nation to continue to produce enough food to withstand an invasion that may last years.</i></p><p></center></p><p class="double"></p><p>\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0That was certainly interesting. Twilight had known that Equestrian Rangers were designed to protect the Crown, but she had no idea that their deployment was so intricate. With a good portion of the Rangers still helping produce food, Equestria would prove to be a difficult nation to take by direct force. Twilight read on.</p><p class="double"></p><p>\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0<center><i><b> The Wonderbolts</b> \xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x9cFaster, Swifter, Stronger\xe2\x80\x9d is the motto of the Wonderbolts, and it is a motto they strive to uphold each and every night. The Bolts are hands down the best aerial force Sol has ever seen, the first deployed to an engagement and the last to leave. Ancient pegasi magic combined with aerial moves introduced by the iconic Commander Hurricane has given the Bolts a reputation well deserved. Undying loyalty to the Crown they serve and to each other leaves the Wonderbolts as Equestria\xe2\x80\x99s oldest military force.</i></center></p><p class="double"></p><p>\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0So <i>that</i> was what Rainbow Dash was getting herself into. It sounded like the Wonderbolts strived to be the very best, all the time. It seemed rather unrealistic to Twilight, and the studious mare wondered if Dash would be up to the challenge.</p><p class="double"></p><p>\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0<center><i><b> Medic Corps</b> \xe2\x80\x93The Medic Corps have been around as long as the Wonderbolts. Comprised of animal Whisperers and the best doctors Equestria can provide, the Corps is the singular force that keeps Equestria breathing. From combating sickness in Equestria\xe2\x80\x99s many cities and towns, to practicing their art upon the field of battle, the Corps provide the muscle behind recovery.</i></center></p><p class="double"></p><p>\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0Well, that certainly sounded right up Fluttershy\xe2\x80\x99s alley, if she could get over her intense shyness. Twilight didn\xe2\x80\x99t know any other pony that would care so much for a complete stranger.</p><p class="indented double"><center><i><b> Canterlot Guard </b>--The Canterlot Guard is one of the last lines of defense for the Equestrian Crown. They mainly police the palace and the grounds itself, although it has been known for Canterlot Guards to sign contracts with other nobility.</i></center></p><p class="double"></p><p>\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0That was what Shining Armor was, a Canterlot Guard. Nothing made her brother happier than to be defending the Princess.</p><p class="double">\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0</p><p>\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0<center><i><b> Equestrian Intelligence </b> \xe2\x80\x93EI knows everything. A vast spy network comprised of undercover agents everywhere, Equestrian Intelligence ensures the nation they serve is prepared for anything. Every major plan, every notable event usually revolves around an EI combat agent. They operate from the shadows, usually shaping Equestria\xe2\x80\x99s future more than any other military force.</i></center></p><p class="double"></p><p>\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0Equestrian Intelligence had Pinkie Pie written all over it. That pony knew things about other ponies she had no business knowing about. It didn\xe2\x80\x99t matter if it was a thought never spoken aloud. Pinkie Pie would still know about it.</p><p class="double"></p><p>\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0<center><i><b> Arcane Brigade</b> \xe2\x80\x93If there is one thing the enemies of Equestria fear, it is Princess Luna\xe2\x80\x99s Arcane Brigade. Comprised of the most deadly spell casters ever born, the Brigade only enters a conflict when the need is dire. The Brigade guards their magical secrets jealously, ensuring that enemies know next to nothing about them. The Brigade is also responsible for Equestria\xe2\x80\x99s advancements with magic.</i></center></p><p class="double"></p><p>\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0The Arcane Brigade. The name sent pleasing shivers down Twilight\xe2\x80\x99s spine. She had always dreamed that she would have a chance to join the Brigade, after learning all she could from a Master Mage. The Brigade solved <i>everything</i>, and Twilight would love nothing more than to be that part of Equestria\xe2\x80\x99s forces. Perhaps Luna would allow her to join the Brigade after Twilight completed her training.</p><p class="double"></p><p>\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0<center><i><b> The Valkyrie</b> \xe2\x80\x93If the Arcane Brigade brings fear to Equestria\xe2\x80\x99s enemies, then Princess Luna\xe2\x80\x99s Valkyrie brings unbridled terror. Throughout Equestria\xe2\x80\x99s history, the Valkyrie has been a mare every bit as powerful as Princess Luna herself. Records show that victory is guaranteed when the Valkyrie takes to the battlefield. Mastering every branch of magic known to Sol, the Valkyrie is Princess Luna\xe2\x80\x99s right hoof, meting out justice where she sees fit. The other branches of military also directly answer to the Valkyrie, rather than Princess Luna. </i></center></p><p class="double"></p><p>\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0<i>This </i> was a name that brought back foalhood memories. Everypony knew who the Valkyrie had been. Respected, feared, and loved as much as the Princess herself, the last Valkyrie vanished sometime during the giant War almost a thousand years ago. To the best of Twilight\xe2\x80\x99s knowledge, there has not been one since.</p><p class="double"></p><p>\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0<center><i><b> Princess Luna </b> \xe2\x80\x93There has only been one instance where the Princess of Equestria has entered combat personally. This was back during the War of the Sun and Moon decades ago, when the usurper Corona Flare attempted to claim the throne of Equestria. The details of this war are vague at best, but it is a testament of Princess Luna\xe2\x80\x99s prowess that Corona Flare is no more.</i></center></p><p class="double"></p><p>\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0Twilight remembered reading vague details about this war. All anypony remembered was that Corona Flare attempted to usurp Princess Luna\xe2\x80\x99s position, to bring about never-ending day. After a vicious war, Princess Luna emerged victorious, and supposedly banished Flare into the Sun. At the time, Twilight had thought the tale was simply something to entertain young foals. After seeing Princess Luna up close, and <i>feeling </i> her majestic power, Twilight was starting to think that perhaps there was a grain of truth to this story. With a thoughtful expression, Twilight opened the second text.</p><p class="double"></p><p>\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0<b><u><center>Magical Basics</center></u></b></p><p class="double">\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0<center><i>Magic is a part of everything. From the visible and flashy magic of unicorns and other casters, to the more subtle passive magic of ground and fliers, magic is everywhere. Over the years, magic has branched out into ten different categories, each with their own counterpart. They are as follows:</i></p><p></center></p><p>\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0</p><p><center><img src="//fc05.deviantart.net/fs71/f/2013/163/4/d/untitled_by_songsaga-d68q0e7.png" class="user_image" /></center></p><p class="double">\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0<i><center>There have been numerous disputes when categorizing magic as we know it. For example, a good many scholars and mages feel that Light and Night should be their own counterparts and that a new Accord Magic should be created for Destruction. However, this idea is not entirely sound and has been thus far ignored; Light magic focuses on strength, courage, and </i> creating<i> new things, while Destruction does the exact opposite.</i></center></p><p class="double"></p><p>\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0Twilight knew all of this already. But Princess Luna undoubtedly had some reason to bring this to the forefront of the unicorn\xe2\x80\x99s mind. Twilight was interrupted from her thoughts by the reappearance of Luna, who had a strange gleam in her eye.</p><p class="double">\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xe2\x80\x9cGood, you are finished reading! Now, let us set you up with some chores.\xe2\x80\x9d</p><p class="double">\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xe2\x80\x9cChores?\xe2\x80\x9d Twilight echoed, confused. This was not what she had expected when Luna had said there she was going to teach Twilight magic.</p><p class="double">\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xe2\x80\x9cYes, chores. Take a look around, Twilight. Are there any servants here?\xe2\x80\x9d</p><p class="double">\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xe2\x80\x9cNo, Princess.\xe2\x80\x9d Twilight was confusion layered her voice, but she did have a small inkling of where this was going.</p><p class="double">\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xe2\x80\x9cOf course there is not! Servants rarely ever approach my study and its hallway; it is the one place they are forbidden from!\xe2\x80\x9d</p><p class="double">\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0This made sense. Twilight had noticed a distinct lack of servants on her walk here, despite the haze over her mind at the time. \xe2\x80\x9cSo then I am going to perform the cleaning they are unable to do?\xe2\x80\x9d Try as she might, Twilight could not hide the disappointment coloring her words.</p><p class="double">\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0Luna finally had mercy on her student. \xe2\x80\x9cRelax, Twilight. You are not in trouble. This is my way of gauging your magical aptitude. I don\xe2\x80\x99t want you to do anything overly fancy to accomplish what I ask of you. All you should need to do is some levitation and a few other minor spells. I want to test your control and see how you go about completing everynight tasks. Firstly, I would like you to clean up after our lunch. After that, the fireplace needs cleaning out and the mantle dusted. The rugs need to be dirt free. Then you can start on my bookshelves. Dust them and clean them. Make sure my books are all categorized. Once you are finished, then I can get a better idea of where to start you in your training.\xe2\x80\x9d</p><p class="double">\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0Twilight perked up a bit. Housework was nothing new to her, despite being of noble birth; growing up in the palace instead of a foster home meant she had to clean her own room on numerous occasions. The fact that the Princess wanted Twilight use magic made the work more bearable. Humming a faint tune, Twilight got started. Horn shimmering with a low key magenta glow, she attacked the stuff left over from lunch. A single horn wave removed leftover foodstuffs from utensils and surfaces, and then a further wave sent the implements sailing back to their proper place in the kitchenette. At the same time the purple unicorn attacked the fireplace, Vanishing the ash left over from its last use and whitening the bricks a bit. She then produced a small duster and proceeded to buff the mantle. By that time she had finished the lunch mess and moved onto the books and bookshelves.</p><p class="double">\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0Princess Luna watched her student with interest. She was using and maintaining spells constantly, without conscious effort. Twilight\xe2\x80\x99s horn didn\xe2\x80\x99t even shine any brighter than it had at first, signaling a record low power usage despite all the magic the unicorn was using. It was starting to look like taking Twilight as her personal prot\xc3\xa9g\xc3\xa9 was a very good decision. As Luna watched her student, her eyes started to wander. Twilight was young, certainly, but no less an appealing mare. Her legs were sturdy and strong, a testimony to an active pony despite Twilight\xe2\x80\x99s love for books. The fact that Twilight was not some fat, lazy scholar was a very good thing, in Luna\xe2\x80\x99s book. While Twilight was nowhere near as glossy and graceful as Luna, there was a certain symphony about her movements, as the unicorn turned slightly to keep an eye on her spells. And besides, gracefulness would come in time. All in all, she was confident that she had chosen well. Twilight would make a good Valkyrie.</p><p>\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0</p><p class="double"></p><p></b></u></i></span></center></blockquote></p>\t</body>\n</html>', 'version': 1, 'parent_story_id': 104188}, 'chapter_id': 323064, 'cursor': <mysql.connector.cursor.MySQLCursor object at 0x02E29B50>, 'connection': <mysql.connector.connection.MySQLConnection object at 0x02E01A70>, 'html': '<html>\n\t<head>\n\t\t<head><meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=UTF-8"/></head>\n\t</head>\n\t<body>\n\t\t<h1><a href="http://www.fimfiction.net/story/104188/valkyrie">Valkyrie</a></h1>\n\t\t<h2>by <a href="http://www.fimfiction.net/user/Flicka+Ravenhide">Flicka Ravenhide</a></h2>\n\n\t\t<hr />\n\n\t\t<a name=\'3\'></a><h3>Chapter 3</h3>\n<p class=\'indented\'>Twilight watched in slight fascination as Luna went about the task of preparing a simple meal. At first, Twilight had wanted to question why on Equestria Princess Luna had a small kitchenette in her <i>study</i> of all places. Then Twilight reminded herself that Luna was a Princess, and therefore could have a kitchen anywhere she chose to. After that, Twilight became distracted just watching Luna. The Alicorn moved about the appliances with gentle grace, never once hurrying as she chopped some greens for a simple salad and sliced some fresh turkey meat for sandwiches. The latter was what Twilight was really looking forward to; Meat was quite rare in Equestria, as they could never grow it fast enough to feed an entire nation. Meat was usually reserved for special occasions like Hearth\xe2\x80\x99s Warming Eve, and the rest of the time the ponies of Equestria made due with enhanced fruits and vegetables.</p><p class="double">\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0It took Twilight a few moments to realize that she was no longer just watching the Princess work. Time and again Twilight\xe2\x80\x99s eyes were drawn to Luna\xe2\x80\x99s seemingly natural beauty. Princess Luna was only a stretch or two taller than Twilight, but the Princess still had legs that gave the impression of being miles long. Luna\xe2\x80\x99s backside was so smooth, rippling and coiling as the ruler of Equestria moved about. And her wings! They fanned the air gently every now and then as Luna stirred and mixed, full of downy tenderness and strong energy. \xc2\xa0Twilight felt her cheeks heat furiously and quickly averted her eyes, scolding herself for ogling the Princess so! Thankfully, by the time Princess Luna turned bearing a tray of food in her obsidian magic, Twilight had managed to wrest her blush under control. And her wandering eyes.</p><p class="double">\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0Luna plunked down a turkey and sunflower sandwich in front of her new student and set the salad aside for the moment. She gestured to the food. \xe2\x80\x9cEat, Twilight. I find it easier to learn new things on a full stomach.\xe2\x80\x9d</p><p class="double">\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0Hesitating slightly (she was still in the presence of <i>the</i> Princess!) Twilight took a nibble from her sandwich. She immediately began eating with gusto, moaning slightly. It had been far too long since she had been able to have any meat at all. Princess Luna grinned, clearly pleased.</p><p class="double">\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0Twilight swallowed. \xe2\x80\x9cSo, Princess\xe2\x80\x94\xe2\x80\x9d</p><p class="double">\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xe2\x80\x9cLuna,\xe2\x80\x9d came the swift correction, and Twilight smiled slightly.</p><p>\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0</p><p>\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xe2\x80\x9cLuna,\xe2\x80\x9d Twilight tried again. \xe2\x80\x9cWhy exactly are you going to teach me about all ten branches of magic?\xe2\x80\x9d</p><p class="double">\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0Princess Luna actually arched an eyebrow. \xe2\x80\x9cDo you not wish to learn more about magic?\xe2\x80\x9d</p><p class="double">\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0Twilight was quick to assure her mentor. \xe2\x80\x9cOf course I do, Princess. But no other mage would accept an apprentice who wanted to study a branch of magic outside what they taught.\xe2\x80\x9d</p><p class="double">\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0Princess Luna frowned briefly at the renewed use of her title before she spoke. \xe2\x80\x9cI am also no mere mage, Twilight Sparkle. You have not escaped my notice, living in the palace. I\xe2\x80\x99ve seen you diving into your studies, determined to learn everything you could about magic in general. Most other students are simply content to follow one path. Even from an early age, however, you were seeking knowledge on as many branches of magic as you could. Some magic, you discovered, are not exactly talked about in any depth in any of the books you\xe2\x80\x99ve studied. Friendship and Animosity are examples of this, as those two do not always manifest in the clearest ways possible. Others, like Necromancy, are not talked about at all, merely glossed over with a hurried explanation. Yet no matter what you managed to read, no book at the Canterlot Archives actually taught you the proper techniques for magic, did they?\xe2\x80\x9d</p><p class="double">\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0Twilight took another bite of her sandwich before answering. \xe2\x80\x9cNo. What little I do know about magic I taught myself. It was enough that I could impress any Master I wanted. But that plan didn\xe2\x80\x99t go over well. I didn\xe2\x80\x99t see a single mage at the time of my Choosing.\xe2\x80\x9d</p><p class="double">\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xe2\x80\x9cBecause I warned them to stay away, Twilight,\xe2\x80\x9d Luna spoke gently. \xe2\x80\x9cI told them, under no circumstances, were any Mage to appear at your Choosing. I had chosen you to be my next prot\xc3\xa9g\xc3\xa9e long before any of those fools had their eyes on you.\xe2\x80\x9d</p><p class="double">\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0Twilight looked up at this revelation, eyes wide. \xe2\x80\x9cBut why, Princess? I am naught but a curious unicorn filly who loves to read. What if I don\xe2\x80\x99t live up to your expectations?\xe2\x80\x9d</p><p class="double">\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0Princess Luna chuckled a tiny bit, finally understanding what was eating away at her new student. \xe2\x80\x9cI chose you because I can see your potential, Twilight Sparkle. And I shall leave it at that. But know this: If you do not live up to my expectations, then I will keep trying until you get it right. I know you will always put forth your best effort, but not every pony can just automatically be good at everything. I want to help guide you upon your journey, and I cannot do that if I abandon you over a small mistake. Now, come. I see that you have finished your lunch, as have I. I\xe2\x80\x99ve got some books I\xe2\x80\x99d like you to read a few passages from. After that, I believe I can find some other stuff for you to work on.\xe2\x80\x9d</p><p class="double">\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0Luna stood up, clearing the small table with a pulse from her horn. In the same pulse, she levitated two thick tomes over to Twilight. Tilting her head sideways, Twilight read the titles: <i>Military Equestria</i> and <i>Basic Guide to Magic</i>.</p><p class="double">\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xe2\x80\x9cThese two books will become your primary sources of information for the time being. A good deal of your initial studies will revolve around these two. I\xe2\x80\x99ve already marked the pages I would like you to read from. Start with <i>Military Equestria</i> and go from there. I must take care of a small bit of business, and then I will return.\xe2\x80\x9d</p><p class="double">\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0With that, Princess Luna was gone. Frowning a bit at her teacher\xe2\x80\x99s sudden disappearance, Twilight cracked open the first book she had been told to read. The unicorn rifled through the pages until she found the pages marked by a magical bookmark and began to read.</p><p class="double"><center><u><b>Equestria\xe2\x80\x99s Military Forces.</b></u></center></p><p class="double">\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0<center><i><b> Equestrian Rangers</b> \xe2\x80\x93The Rangers very rarely fight off of Equestria\xe2\x80\x99s soil. This branch of the military acts as a \xe2\x80\x9cnational guard\xe2\x80\x9d of sorts, mobilizing in the event Equestria becomes invaded. In times of relative peace, the Rangers comprise about sixty percent of Equestria\xe2\x80\x99s food sources, farming land in addition to performing regular military exercises. If Equestria is ever besieged, only forty percent of the Ranger\xe2\x80\x99s full might are ever engaged at one time, allowing the nation to continue to produce enough food to withstand an invasion that may last years.</i></p><p></center></p><p class="double"></p><p>\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0That was certainly interesting. Twilight had known that Equestrian Rangers were designed to protect the Crown, but she had no idea that their deployment was so intricate. With a good portion of the Rangers still helping produce food, Equestria would prove to be a difficult nation to take by direct force. Twilight read on.</p><p class="double"></p><p>\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0<center><i><b> The Wonderbolts</b> \xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x9cFaster, Swifter, Stronger\xe2\x80\x9d is the motto of the Wonderbolts, and it is a motto they strive to uphold each and every night. The Bolts are hands down the best aerial force Sol has ever seen, the first deployed to an engagement and the last to leave. Ancient pegasi magic combined with aerial moves introduced by the iconic Commander Hurricane has given the Bolts a reputation well deserved. Undying loyalty to the Crown they serve and to each other leaves the Wonderbolts as Equestria\xe2\x80\x99s oldest military force.</i></center></p><p class="double"></p><p>\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0So <i>that</i> was what Rainbow Dash was getting herself into. It sounded like the Wonderbolts strived to be the very best, all the time. It seemed rather unrealistic to Twilight, and the studious mare wondered if Dash would be up to the challenge.</p><p class="double"></p><p>\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0<center><i><b> Medic Corps</b> \xe2\x80\x93The Medic Corps have been around as long as the Wonderbolts. Comprised of animal Whisperers and the best doctors Equestria can provide, the Corps is the singular force that keeps Equestria breathing. From combating sickness in Equestria\xe2\x80\x99s many cities and towns, to practicing their art upon the field of battle, the Corps provide the muscle behind recovery.</i></center></p><p class="double"></p><p>\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0Well, that certainly sounded right up Fluttershy\xe2\x80\x99s alley, if she could get over her intense shyness. Twilight didn\xe2\x80\x99t know any other pony that would care so much for a complete stranger.</p><p class="indented double"><center><i><b> Canterlot Guard </b>--The Canterlot Guard is one of the last lines of defense for the Equestrian Crown. They mainly police the palace and the grounds itself, although it has been known for Canterlot Guards to sign contracts with other nobility.</i></center></p><p class="double"></p><p>\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0That was what Shining Armor was, a Canterlot Guard. Nothing made her brother happier than to be defending the Princess.</p><p class="double">\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0</p><p>\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0<center><i><b> Equestrian Intelligence </b> \xe2\x80\x93EI knows everything. A vast spy network comprised of undercover agents everywhere, Equestrian Intelligence ensures the nation they serve is prepared for anything. Every major plan, every notable event usually revolves around an EI combat agent. They operate from the shadows, usually shaping Equestria\xe2\x80\x99s future more than any other military force.</i></center></p><p class="double"></p><p>\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0Equestrian Intelligence had Pinkie Pie written all over it. That pony knew things about other ponies she had no business knowing about. It didn\xe2\x80\x99t matter if it was a thought never spoken aloud. Pinkie Pie would still know about it.</p><p class="double"></p><p>\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0<center><i><b> Arcane Brigade</b> \xe2\x80\x93If there is one thing the enemies of Equestria fear, it is Princess Luna\xe2\x80\x99s Arcane Brigade. Comprised of the most deadly spell casters ever born, the Brigade only enters a conflict when the need is dire. The Brigade guards their magical secrets jealously, ensuring that enemies know next to nothing about them. The Brigade is also responsible for Equestria\xe2\x80\x99s advancements with magic.</i></center></p><p class="double"></p><p>\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0The Arcane Brigade. The name sent pleasing shivers down Twilight\xe2\x80\x99s spine. She had always dreamed that she would have a chance to join the Brigade, after learning all she could from a Master Mage. The Brigade solved <i>everything</i>, and Twilight would love nothing more than to be that part of Equestria\xe2\x80\x99s forces. Perhaps Luna would allow her to join the Brigade after Twilight completed her training.</p><p class="double"></p><p>\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0<center><i><b> The Valkyrie</b> \xe2\x80\x93If the Arcane Brigade brings fear to Equestria\xe2\x80\x99s enemies, then Princess Luna\xe2\x80\x99s Valkyrie brings unbridled terror. Throughout Equestria\xe2\x80\x99s history, the Valkyrie has been a mare every bit as powerful as Princess Luna herself. Records show that victory is guaranteed when the Valkyrie takes to the battlefield. Mastering every branch of magic known to Sol, the Valkyrie is Princess Luna\xe2\x80\x99s right hoof, meting out justice where she sees fit. The other branches of military also directly answer to the Valkyrie, rather than Princess Luna. </i></center></p><p class="double"></p><p>\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0<i>This </i> was a name that brought back foalhood memories. Everypony knew who the Valkyrie had been. Respected, feared, and loved as much as the Princess herself, the last Valkyrie vanished sometime during the giant War almost a thousand years ago. To the best of Twilight\xe2\x80\x99s knowledge, there has not been one since.</p><p class="double"></p><p>\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0<center><i><b> Princess Luna </b> \xe2\x80\x93There has only been one instance where the Princess of Equestria has entered combat personally. This was back during the War of the Sun and Moon decades ago, when the usurper Corona Flare attempted to claim the throne of Equestria. The details of this war are vague at best, but it is a testament of Princess Luna\xe2\x80\x99s prowess that Corona Flare is no more.</i></center></p><p class="double"></p><p>\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0Twilight remembered reading vague details about this war. All anypony remembered was that Corona Flare attempted to usurp Princess Luna\xe2\x80\x99s position, to bring about never-ending day. After a vicious war, Princess Luna emerged victorious, and supposedly banished Flare into the Sun. At the time, Twilight had thought the tale was simply something to entertain young foals. After seeing Princess Luna up close, and <i>feeling </i> her majestic power, Twilight was starting to think that perhaps there was a grain of truth to this story. With a thoughtful expression, Twilight opened the second text.</p><p class="double"></p><p>\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0<b><u><center>Magical Basics</center></u></b></p><p class="double">\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0<center><i>Magic is a part of everything. From the visible and flashy magic of unicorns and other casters, to the more subtle passive magic of ground and fliers, magic is everywhere. Over the years, magic has branched out into ten different categories, each with their own counterpart. They are as follows:</i></p><p></center></p><p>\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0</p><p><center><img src="//fc05.deviantart.net/fs71/f/2013/163/4/d/untitled_by_songsaga-d68q0e7.png" class="user_image" /></center></p><p class="double">\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0<i><center>There have been numerous disputes when categorizing magic as we know it. For example, a good many scholars and mages feel that Light and Night should be their own counterparts and that a new Accord Magic should be created for Destruction. However, this idea is not entirely sound and has been thus far ignored; Light magic focuses on strength, courage, and </i> creating<i> new things, while Destruction does the exact opposite.</i></center></p><p class="double"></p><p>\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0Twilight knew all of this already. But Princess Luna undoubtedly had some reason to bring this to the forefront of the unicorn\xe2\x80\x99s mind. Twilight was interrupted from her thoughts by the reappearance of Luna, who had a strange gleam in her eye.</p><p class="double">\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xe2\x80\x9cGood, you are finished reading! Now, let us set you up with some chores.\xe2\x80\x9d</p><p class="double">\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xe2\x80\x9cChores?\xe2\x80\x9d Twilight echoed, confused. This was not what she had expected when Luna had said there she was going to teach Twilight magic.</p><p class="double">\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xe2\x80\x9cYes, chores. Take a look around, Twilight. Are there any servants here?\xe2\x80\x9d</p><p class="double">\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xe2\x80\x9cNo, Princess.\xe2\x80\x9d Twilight was confusion layered her voice, but she did have a small inkling of where this was going.</p><p class="double">\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xe2\x80\x9cOf course there is not! Servants rarely ever approach my study and its hallway; it is the one place they are forbidden from!\xe2\x80\x9d</p><p class="double">\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0This made sense. Twilight had noticed a distinct lack of servants on her walk here, despite the haze over her mind at the time. \xe2\x80\x9cSo then I am going to perform the cleaning they are unable to do?\xe2\x80\x9d Try as she might, Twilight could not hide the disappointment coloring her words.</p><p class="double">\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0Luna finally had mercy on her student. \xe2\x80\x9cRelax, Twilight. You are not in trouble. This is my way of gauging your magical aptitude. I don\xe2\x80\x99t want you to do anything overly fancy to accomplish what I ask of you. All you should need to do is some levitation and a few other minor spells. I want to test your control and see how you go about completing everynight tasks. Firstly, I would like you to clean up after our lunch. After that, the fireplace needs cleaning out and the mantle dusted. The rugs need to be dirt free. Then you can start on my bookshelves. Dust them and clean them. Make sure my books are all categorized. Once you are finished, then I can get a better idea of where to start you in your training.\xe2\x80\x9d</p><p class="double">\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0Twilight perked up a bit. Housework was nothing new to her, despite being of noble birth; growing up in the palace instead of a foster home meant she had to clean her own room on numerous occasions. The fact that the Princess wanted Twilight use magic made the work more bearable. Humming a faint tune, Twilight got started. Horn shimmering with a low key magenta glow, she attacked the stuff left over from lunch. A single horn wave removed leftover foodstuffs from utensils and surfaces, and then a further wave sent the implements sailing back to their proper place in the kitchenette. At the same time the purple unicorn attacked the fireplace, Vanishing the ash left over from its last use and whitening the bricks a bit. She then produced a small duster and proceeded to buff the mantle. By that time she had finished the lunch mess and moved onto the books and bookshelves.</p><p class="double">\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0Princess Luna watched her student with interest. She was using and maintaining spells constantly, without conscious effort. Twilight\xe2\x80\x99s horn didn\xe2\x80\x99t even shine any brighter than it had at first, signaling a record low power usage despite all the magic the unicorn was using. It was starting to look like taking Twilight as her personal prot\xc3\xa9g\xc3\xa9 was a very good decision. As Luna watched her student, her eyes started to wander. Twilight was young, certainly, but no less an appealing mare. Her legs were sturdy and strong, a testimony to an active pony despite Twilight\xe2\x80\x99s love for books. The fact that Twilight was not some fat, lazy scholar was a very good thing, in Luna\xe2\x80\x99s book. While Twilight was nowhere near as glossy and graceful as Luna, there was a certain symphony about her movements, as the unicorn turned slightly to keep an eye on her spells. And besides, gracefulness would come in time. All in all, she was confident that she had chosen well. Twilight would make a good Valkyrie.</p><p>\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0</p><p class="double"></p><p></b></u></i></span></center></blockquote></p>\t</body>\n</html>', 'values': ['//------------------------------//\n// Chapter 3// Story: Valkyrie// by Flicka Ravenhide//------------------------------//\n\n\tTwilight watched in slight fascination as Luna went about the task of preparing a simple meal. At first, Twilight had wanted to question why on Equestria Princess Luna had a small kitchenette in her study of all places. Then Twilight reminded herself that Luna was a Princess, and therefore could have a kitchen anywhere she chose to. After that, Twilight became distracted just watching Luna. The Alicorn moved about the appliances with gentle grace, never once hurrying as she chopped some greens for a simple salad and sliced some fresh turkey meat for sandwiches. The latter was what Twilight was really looking forward to; Meat was quite rare in Equestria, as they could never grow it fast enough to feed an entire nation. Meat was usually reserved for special occasions like Hearth\xe2\x80\x99s Warming Eve, and the rest of the time the ponies of Equestria made due with enhanced fruits and vegetables.\r\n\r\n\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0It took Twilight a few moments to realize that she was no longer just watching the Princess work. Time and again Twilight\xe2\x80\x99s eyes were drawn to Luna\xe2\x80\x99s seemingly natural beauty. Princess Luna was only a stretch or two taller than Twilight, but the Princess still had legs that gave the impression of being miles long. Luna\xe2\x80\x99s backside was so smooth, rippling and coiling as the ruler of Equestria moved about. And her wings! They fanned the air gently every now and then as Luna stirred and mixed, full of downy tenderness and strong energy. \xc2\xa0Twilight felt her cheeks heat furiously and quickly averted her eyes, scolding herself for ogling the Princess so! Thankfully, by the time Princess Luna turned bearing a tray of food in her obsidian magic, Twilight had managed to wrest her blush under control. And her wandering eyes.\r\n\r\n\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0Luna plunked down a turkey and sunflower sandwich in front of her new student and set the salad aside for the moment. She gestured to the food. \xe2\x80\x9cEat, Twilight. I find it easier to learn new things on a full stomach.\xe2\x80\x9d\r\n\r\n\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0Hesitating slightly (she was still in the presence of the Princess!) Twilight took a nibble from her sandwich. She immediately began eating with gusto, moaning slightly. It had been far too long since she had been able to have any meat at all. Princess Luna grinned, clearly pleased.\r\n\r\n\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0Twilight swallowed. \xe2\x80\x9cSo, Princess\xe2\x80\x94\xe2\x80\x9d\r\n\r\n\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xe2\x80\x9cLuna,\xe2\x80\x9d came the swift correction, and Twilight smiled slightly.\r\n\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\r\n\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xe2\x80\x9cLuna,\xe2\x80\x9d Twilight tried again. \xe2\x80\x9cWhy exactly are you going to teach me about all ten branches of magic?\xe2\x80\x9d\r\n\r\n\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0Princess Luna actually arched an eyebrow. \xe2\x80\x9cDo you not wish to learn more about magic?\xe2\x80\x9d\r\n\r\n\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0Twilight was quick to assure her mentor. \xe2\x80\x9cOf course I do, Princess. But no other mage would accept an apprentice who wanted to study a branch of magic outside what they taught.\xe2\x80\x9d\r\n\r\n\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0Princess Luna frowned briefly at the renewed use of her title before she spoke. \xe2\x80\x9cI am also no mere mage, Twilight Sparkle. You have not escaped my notice, living in the palace. I\xe2\x80\x99ve seen you diving into your studies, determined to learn everything you could about magic in general. Most other students are simply content to follow one path. Even from an early age, however, you were seeking knowledge on as many branches of magic as you could. Some magic, you discovered, are not exactly talked about in any depth in any of the books you\xe2\x80\x99ve studied. Friendship and Animosity are examples of this, as those two do not always manifest in the clearest ways possible. Others, like Necromancy, are not talked about at all, merely glossed over with a hurried explanation. Yet no matter what you managed to read, no book at the Canterlot Archives actually taught you the proper techniques for magic, did they?\xe2\x80\x9d\r\n\r\n\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0Twilight took another bite of her sandwich before answering. \xe2\x80\x9cNo. What little I do know about magic I taught myself. It was enough that I could impress any Master I wanted. But that plan didn\xe2\x80\x99t go over well. I didn\xe2\x80\x99t see a single mage at the time of my Choosing.\xe2\x80\x9d\r\n\r\n\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xe2\x80\x9cBecause I warned them to stay away, Twilight,\xe2\x80\x9d Luna spoke gently. \xe2\x80\x9cI told them, under no circumstances, were any Mage to appear at your Choosing. I had chosen you to be my next prot\xc3\xa9g\xc3\xa9e long before any of those fools had their eyes on you.\xe2\x80\x9d\r\n\r\n\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0Twilight looked up at this revelation, eyes wide. \xe2\x80\x9cBut why, Princess? I am naught but a curious unicorn filly who loves to read. What if I don\xe2\x80\x99t live up to your expectations?\xe2\x80\x9d\r\n\r\n\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0Princess Luna chuckled a tiny bit, finally understanding what was eating away at her new student. \xe2\x80\x9cI chose you because I can see your potential, Twilight Sparkle. And I shall leave it at that. But know this: If you do not live up to my expectations, then I will keep trying until you get it right. I know you will always put forth your best effort, but not every pony can just automatically be good at everything. I want to help guide you upon your journey, and I cannot do that if I abandon you over a small mistake. Now, come. I see that you have finished your lunch, as have I. I\xe2\x80\x99ve got some books I\xe2\x80\x99d like you to read a few passages from. After that, I believe I can find some other stuff for you to work on.\xe2\x80\x9d\r\n\r\n\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0Luna stood up, clearing the small table with a pulse from her horn. In the same pulse, she levitated two thick tomes over to Twilight. Tilting her head sideways, Twilight read the titles: Military Equestria and Basic Guide to Magic.\r\n\r\n\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xe2\x80\x9cThese two books will become your primary sources of information for the time being. A good deal of your initial studies will revolve around these two. I\xe2\x80\x99ve already marked the pages I would like you to read from. Start with Military Equestria and go from there. I must take care of a small bit of business, and then I will return.\xe2\x80\x9d\r\n\r\n\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0With that, Princess Luna was gone. Frowning a bit at her teacher\xe2\x80\x99s sudden disappearance, Twilight cracked open the first book she had been told to read. The unicorn rifled through the pages until she found the pages marked by a magical bookmark and began to read.\r\n\r\nEquestria\xe2\x80\x99s Military Forces.\r\n\r\n\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0 Equestrian Rangers \xe2\x80\x93The Rangers very rarely fight off of Equestria\xe2\x80\x99s soil. This branch of the military acts as a \xe2\x80\x9cnational guard\xe2\x80\x9d of sorts, mobilizing in the event Equestria becomes invaded. In times of relative peace, the Rangers comprise about sixty percent of Equestria\xe2\x80\x99s food sources, farming land in addition to performing regular military exercises. If Equestria is ever besieged, only forty percent of the Ranger\xe2\x80\x99s full might are ever engaged at one time, allowing the nation to continue to produce enough food to withstand an invasion that may last years.\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0That was certainly interesting. Twilight had known that Equestrian Rangers were designed to protect the Crown, but she had no idea that their deployment was so intricate. With a good portion of the Rangers still helping produce food, Equestria would prove to be a difficult nation to take by direct force. Twilight read on.\r\n\r\n\r\n\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0 The Wonderbolts \xe2\x80\x93\xe2\x80\x9cFaster, Swifter, Stronger\xe2\x80\x9d is the motto of the Wonderbolts, and it is a motto they strive to uphold each and every night. The Bolts are hands down the best aerial force Sol has ever seen, the first deployed to an engagement and the last to leave. Ancient pegasi magic combined with aerial moves introduced by the iconic Commander Hurricane has given the Bolts a reputation well deserved. Undying loyalty to the Crown they serve and to each other leaves the Wonderbolts as Equestria\xe2\x80\x99s oldest military force.\r\n\r\n\r\n\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0So that was what Rainbow Dash was getting herself into. It sounded like the Wonderbolts strived to be the very best, all the time. It seemed rather unrealistic to Twilight, and the studious mare wondered if Dash would be up to the challenge.\r\n\r\n\r\n\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0 Medic Corps \xe2\x80\x93The Medic Corps have been around as long as the Wonderbolts. Comprised of animal Whisperers and the best doctors Equestria can provide, the Corps is the singular force that keeps Equestria breathing. From combating sickness in Equestria\xe2\x80\x99s many cities and towns, to practicing their art upon the field of battle, the Corps provide the muscle behind recovery.\r\n\r\n\r\n\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0Well, that certainly sounded right up Fluttershy\xe2\x80\x99s alley, if she could get over her intense shyness. Twilight didn\xe2\x80\x99t know any other pony that would care so much for a complete stranger.\r\n\r\n\t Canterlot Guard --The Canterlot Guard is one of the last lines of defense for the Equestrian Crown. They mainly police the palace and the grounds itself, although it has been known for Canterlot Guards to sign contracts with other nobility.\r\n\t\r\n\r\n\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0That was what Shining Armor was, a Canterlot Guard. Nothing made her brother happier than to be defending the Princess.\r\n\r\n\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\r\n\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0 Equestrian Intelligence  \xe2\x80\x93EI knows everything. A vast spy network comprised of undercover agents everywhere, Equestrian Intelligence ensures the nation they serve is prepared for anything. Every major plan, every notable event usually revolves around an EI combat agent. They operate from the shadows, usually shaping Equestria\xe2\x80\x99s future more than any other military force.\r\n\r\n\r\n\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0Equestrian Intelligence had Pinkie Pie written all over it. That pony knew things about other ponies she had no business knowing about. It didn\xe2\x80\x99t matter if it was a thought never spoken aloud. Pinkie Pie would still know about it.\r\n\r\n\r\n\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0 Arcane Brigade \xe2\x80\x93If there is one thing the enemies of Equestria fear, it is Princess Luna\xe2\x80\x99s Arcane Brigade. Comprised of the most deadly spell casters ever born, the Brigade only enters a conflict when the need is dire. The Brigade guards their magical secrets jealously, ensuring that enemies know next to nothing about them. The Brigade is also responsible for Equestria\xe2\x80\x99s advancements with magic.\r\n\r\n\r\n\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0The Arcane Brigade. The name sent pleasing shivers down Twilight\xe2\x80\x99s spine. She had always dreamed that she would have a chance to join the Brigade, after learning all she could from a Master Mage. The Brigade solved everything, and Twilight would love nothing more than to be that part of Equestria\xe2\x80\x99s forces. Perhaps Luna would allow her to join the Brigade after Twilight completed her training.\r\n\r\n\r\n\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0 The Valkyrie \xe2\x80\x93If the Arcane Brigade brings fear to Equestria\xe2\x80\x99s enemies, then Princess Luna\xe2\x80\x99s Valkyrie brings unbridled terror. Throughout Equestria\xe2\x80\x99s history, the Valkyrie has been a mare every bit as powerful as Princess Luna herself. Records show that victory is guaranteed when the Valkyrie takes to the battlefield. Mastering every branch of magic known to Sol, the Valkyrie is Princess Luna\xe2\x80\x99s right hoof, meting out justice where she sees fit. The other branches of military also directly answer to the Valkyrie, rather than Princess Luna. \r\n\r\n\r\n\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0This  was a name that brought back foalhood memories. Everypony knew who the Valkyrie had been. Respected, feared, and loved as much as the Princess herself, the last Valkyrie vanished sometime during the giant War almost a thousand years ago. To the best of Twilight\xe2\x80\x99s knowledge, there has not been one since.\r\n\r\n\r\n\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0 Princess Luna  \xe2\x80\x93There has only been one instance where the Princess of Equestria has entered combat personally. This was back during the War of the Sun and Moon decades ago, when the usurper Corona Flare attempted to claim the throne of Equestria. The details of this war are vague at best, but it is a testament of Princess Luna\xe2\x80\x99s prowess that Corona Flare is no more.\r\n\r\n\r\n\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0Twilight remembered reading vague details about this war. All anypony remembered was that Corona Flare attempted to usurp Princess Luna\xe2\x80\x99s position, to bring about never-ending day. After a vicious war, Princess Luna emerged victorious, and supposedly banished Flare into the Sun. At the time, Twilight had thought the tale was simply something to entertain young foals. After seeing Princess Luna up close, and feeling  her majestic power, Twilight was starting to think that perhaps there was a grain of truth to this story. With a thoughtful expression, Twilight opened the second text.\r\n\r\n\r\n\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0Magical Basics\r\n\r\n\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0Magic is a part of everything. From the visible and flashy magic of unicorns and other casters, to the more subtle passive magic of ground and fliers, magic is everywhere. Over the years, magic has branched out into ten different categories, each with their own counterpart. They are as follows:\r\n\r\n\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\r\n\r\n\r\n\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0There have been numerous disputes when categorizing magic as we know it. For example, a good many scholars and mages feel that Light and Night should be their own counterparts and that a new Accord Magic should be created for Destruction. However, this idea is not entirely sound and has been thus far ignored; Light magic focuses on strength, courage, and  creating new things, while Destruction does the exact opposite.\r\n\r\n\r\n\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0Twilight knew all of this already. But Princess Luna undoubtedly had some reason to bring this to the forefront of the unicorn\xe2\x80\x99s mind. Twilight was interrupted from her thoughts by the reappearance of Luna, who had a strange gleam in her eye.\r\n\r\n\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xe2\x80\x9cGood, you are finished reading! Now, let us set you up with some chores.\xe2\x80\x9d\r\n\r\n\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xe2\x80\x9cChores?\xe2\x80\x9d Twilight echoed, confused. This was not what she had expected when Luna had said there she was going to teach Twilight magic.\r\n\r\n\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xe2\x80\x9cYes, chores. Take a look around, Twilight. Are there any servants here?\xe2\x80\x9d\r\n\r\n\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xe2\x80\x9cNo, Princess.\xe2\x80\x9d Twilight was confusion layered her voice, but she did have a small inkling of where this was going.\r\n\r\n\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xe2\x80\x9cOf course there is not! Servants rarely ever approach my study and its hallway; it is the one place they are forbidden from!\xe2\x80\x9d\r\n\r\n\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0This made sense. Twilight had noticed a distinct lack of servants on her walk here, despite the haze over her mind at the time. \xe2\x80\x9cSo then I am going to perform the cleaning they are unable to do?\xe2\x80\x9d Try as she might, Twilight could not hide the disappointment coloring her words.\r\n\r\n\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0Luna finally had mercy on her student. \xe2\x80\x9cRelax, Twilight. You are not in trouble. This is my way of gauging your magical aptitude. I don\xe2\x80\x99t want you to do anything overly fancy to accomplish what I ask of you. All you should need to do is some levitation and a few other minor spells. I want to test your control and see how you go about completing everynight tasks. Firstly, I would like you to clean up after our lunch. After that, the fireplace needs cleaning out and the mantle dusted. The rugs need to be dirt free. Then you can start on my bookshelves. Dust them and clean them. Make sure my books are all categorized. Once you are finished, then I can get a better idea of where to start you in your training.\xe2\x80\x9d\r\n\r\n\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0Twilight perked up a bit. Housework was nothing new to her, despite being of noble birth; growing up in the palace instead of a foster home meant she had to clean her own room on numerous occasions. The fact that the Princess wanted Twilight use magic made the work more bearable. Humming a faint tune, Twilight got started. Horn shimmering with a low key magenta glow, she attacked the stuff left over from lunch. A single horn wave removed leftover foodstuffs from utensils and surfaces, and then a further wave sent the implements sailing back to their proper place in the kitchenette. At the same time the purple unicorn attacked the fireplace, Vanishing the ash left over from its last use and whitening the bricks a bit. She then produced a small duster and proceeded to buff the mantle. By that time she had finished the lunch mess and moved onto the books and bookshelves.\r\n\r\n\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0Princess Luna watched her student with interest. She was using and maintaining spells constantly, without conscious effort. Twilight\xe2\x80\x99s horn didn\xe2\x80\x99t even shine any brighter than it had at first, signaling a record low power usage despite all the magic the unicorn was using. It was starting to look like taking Twilight as her personal prot\xc3\xa9g\xc3\xa9 was a very good decision. As Luna watched her student, her eyes started to wander. Twilight was young, certainly, but no less an appealing mare. Her legs were sturdy and strong, a testimony to an active pony despite Twilight\xe2\x80\x99s love for books. The fact that Twilight was not some fat, lazy scholar was a very good thing, in Luna\xe2\x80\x99s book. While Twilight was nowhere near as glossy and graceful as Luna, there was a certain symphony about her movements, as the unicorn turned slightly to keep an eye on her spells. And besides, gracefulness would come in time. All in all, she was confident that she had chosen well. Twilight would make a good Valkyrie.\r\n\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\r\n\r\n\r\n', 3, 323064, '<html>\n\t<head>\n\t\t<head><meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=UTF-8"/></head>\n\t</head>\n\t<body>\n\t\t<h1><a href="http://www.fimfiction.net/story/104188/valkyrie">Valkyrie</a></h1>\n\t\t<h2>by <a href="http://www.fimfiction.net/user/Flicka+Ravenhide">Flicka Ravenhide</a></h2>\n\n\t\t<hr />\n\n\t\t<a name=\'3\'></a><h3>Chapter 3</h3>\n<p class=\'indented\'>Twilight watched in slight fascination as Luna went about the task of preparing a simple meal. At first, Twilight had wanted to question why on Equestria Princess Luna had a small kitchenette in her <i>study</i> of all places. Then Twilight reminded herself that Luna was a Princess, and therefore could have a kitchen anywhere she chose to. After that, Twilight became distracted just watching Luna. The Alicorn moved about the appliances with gentle grace, never once hurrying as she chopped some greens for a simple salad and sliced some fresh turkey meat for sandwiches. The latter was what Twilight was really looking forward to; Meat was quite rare in Equestria, as they could never grow it fast enough to feed an entire nation.
